apps.title: South China Morning Post: News
apps.developer: South China Morning Post Publishers Limited
apps.description:
The South China Morning Post (SCMP) has been the most authoritative voice reporting on China and Asia for more than a century. As Hong Kong’s English-language newspaper of record, our international team of Asia experts, reporters, journalists, photographers and filmmakers are dedicated to providing breaking news and analysis from Hong Kong, China and beyond.

Our unique home base of Hong Kong allows us to have in-depth understanding of the China story from an insider’s perspective, while enjoying a high level of press freedom and independence granted by the city’s special constitutional principle of “One country, two systems”. Today, our dedication to representing the region with our editorial motto, “truth and fairness” is more relevant than ever before.

Our new app is our biggest app update ever. The update lets you explore curated content tailored to your news interests with My News, and informs you on the stories that matter to you with the redesigned top menu that allows you customise your reading preferences. 

AWARD-WINNING JOURNALISM
Download the South China Morning Post app and receive instant access to the SCMP’s award-winning journalism including coverage of the latest breaking news, both regionally and globally, including: US-China trade war and tech war, Trump vs Xi Jinping, the Hong Kong National Security law, Hong Kong protests and electoral changes, China military, South China Sea news, China’s relations with the EU, India and Australia, health and wellness, fashion and lifestyle updates, climate change and much much more.

KEY FEATURES
Breaking news alerts, tailored to your interests, including exclusives, explainers, live coverage and developing stories
Focus View, a personalised content discovery feature that keeps you informed on what matters to you
Article bookmarking to save your favourite features and articles
Follow your favourite topic/author with myNEWS and get five daily stories curated for you, plus a personalised feed of our most popular content
Customisable bottom navigation, so you can add, remove and rearrange your favourite sections with ease
Tailored top menu for seamless browsing of your preferred topics
Listen-to-article feature so you can listen to stories on the go (subscriber-only)

CONTENT AND COVERAGE
Keep informed with the latest Hong Kong and China headlines, opinion pieces, plus stories from the rest of the world
Full access to all SCMP content, including publications such as Post Magazine, This Week in Asia and Style
Full access to SCMP’s award-winning journalism including Hong Kong news, China news, Asia news, Business, Politics, Economy, Lifestyle, Tech, Health, and Sports
Wide-range of regional topics from our Asia experts including North Korea, South China Sea tensions, China’s Economy, Belt and Road, K-pop, as-well-as a spotlight on China’s tech-giants such as Tencent, Baidu, Bytedance, and Alibaba, Huawei and Xiaomi
Explore new ways to discover our insightful, unique content and current issues with SCMP Films, SCMP Spotlight and SCMP Podcasts, plus video, infographics, pictures and special reports

TERMS OF USE
All content in the South China Morning Post is copyright South China Morning Post Publishers Ltd 2020. All rights reserved. Terms of use and privacy policy apply when accessing content via the South China Morning Post app.

Privacy policy:
https://www.scmp.com/privacy-policy

Terms and conditions:
https://www.scmp.com/terms-conditions

Feedback and Enquiries:
If you have questions or concerns, please contact us at support@scmp.com or (852) 2565 9388. Your feedback is important to us. If you have any suggestions for how we can improve the app please email us.

Support:
The app has been designed to run on iPhone 7 and above and on OS versions 11 and above.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- performance optimisation
- bug fixes

apps.title: Way2News - Short News App
apps.description:
Way2News is India’s largest Hyperlocal Infotainment App that provides local news updates in vernacular languages in a short-summarized format. We are trusted by crores of Indians.

You can flip through interesting stories from various categories in eight Indian languages -Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Hindi, Marathi, Bengali, Malayalam,& Gujarati.


Don’t Have Much Time But Want To Stay Updated With What's Happening Around You?

We provide you with the popular and important stories happening in your locality. Never miss a story as we offer a wide range of categories to keep you entertained and help you stay up-to-date with the current happenings in the world.


Simple & short news that made way2news - celebrities & politicians’ favorite news app.


Main functionalities in the app:


Bookmarks - save stories you don't have time to read, for later

Dark mode - available for all devices

Flip to read - Minute by minute local news updates.


From notifying you with the latest job alerts to providing you with the latest updates in technology, sports, entertainment, and the business world, you can choose which topics matter most to you.


Local Information Is Our Core

Stay updated with current affairs and 24*7 daily events from your state, district, Mandal/Taluk, and village. You can also share your content & write short stories.


Tailored Video Content

Find the most shared, informative & unique videos every day based on your interests. To save your time, we’ve also introduced short videos on the app.


Job Alerts:

Are you looking for a job? If yes, we have them all covered for you. Get the latest job alerts, and local job updates, including, part-time jobs and fresher's job openings. There’s a special category for 10th pass jobs, 12th pass jobs, UG jobs, diploma jobs, etc.


Entertainment:

Keep up with the latest entertainment and cinema updates, and flip through interesting celebrity gossip exclusively on our app. Get to know more about the upcoming movies/new cinema releases, web series, and trending teasers/trailers from Bollywood, Tollywood, Kollywood, Mollywood, and the Indian cinema industry.


Daily Digital Magazine

Get your daily dose of digital magazines to get a clear insight on various topics. From health, Business, Women's world, career, agriculture, travel, real estate, food, & Sunday special magazines. We also publish an exclusive magazine for kids every day. We curate content for you that is easy to read and understand.


Daily Horoscopes & Astrology

Get your daily horoscope of all zodiac signs on love, career, family, wealth, and more. The daily astrology is free and helps you learn what the day has in store for you.


Live Cricket Updates:

Keep up to date with the latest cricket fixtures with live updates and highlights. Get notifications for live matches, schedule for upcoming matches, and exclusive video content. We cover major tournaments like ICC Cricket World Cup, T20 World Cup, IPL, FIFA, Olympics and etc.


We Are Active All Over India

People from different states/union territories like Delhi, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra, West Bengal, Bihar, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Haryana, Punjab, Himachal Pradesh, Gururaj, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Pondicherry, Rajasthan, Tripura, Assam, Goa, Chhattisgarh, Arunachal Pradesh & others states follow us for their daily local content updates.


We are trusted by crores of Indians & Our Mission Is To Deliver hyperlocal news coverage pan India.


Download The App Now & Flip Through Interesting Short Stories from your locality Like Never Before!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Few bugs fixed.
- App performance increased

apps.title: KSL.com News Utah
apps.description:
UTAH LOCAL NEWS
Breaking news, weather and sports gathered by Utah’s best local reporters put you in the know, right now. Keep tabs on the latest developments in state politics, education, business and law enforcement.

UTAH NEWS ALERTS
Enable push notifications to get notified about breaking news, major developments, traffic updates and weather alerts.

UTAH WEATHER
Dress for success when you know what to expect with Utah’s fickle weather. Set your preferences to see your local forecast. Traveling? Check current conditions and air quality across the region.

Plan your recreation too. Read the Ski Report to see slope conditions, or use the River Flow Tracker to plan aquatic adventures.

UTAH SPORTS
All the local team scores, from the Utah Jazz to high school sports. See what’s happening with your favorite college teams on pages dedicated to the Utes, Aggies, Wildcats and Cougars. Listen to BYU football games live on KSL Newsradio, as well as Cougar Sports Saturday.

LIVE COVERAGE 
Watch or listen to news anytime with KSL Newsradio and KSL TV.

apps.title: The Athletic: All Sports News
apps.description:
Keep up with the teams you care about with The Athletic app. Review sports news, scores and stats, and expert insights analysis for each league. Turn on notifications to get real time updates for basketball, football, soccer, hockey, baseball, and more. Get in depth with sports coverage when you can listen to exclusive podcasts and read breaking news stories on your favorite athletes and teams.

Download today to stay up to date on your daily sports news.  

The Athletic Features:

EXCLUSIVE SPORTS NEWS, INSIGHTS, AND ANALYSIS
- Go deeper with in-depth, global coverage and exclusive sports news.
- Our award-winning newsroom of more than 400 sports journalists. 
- Get exclusive access to expert sports insights and analysis. 
- Explore deeply-reported long reads and exclusive sports interviews.


SPORTS SCORES AND STATS ON ALL MAJOR TEAMS AND LEAGUES
- Discover the top sports stories of the day, breaking news and live score updates, all from the biggest names in sports writing.
- Access exclusive coverage on professional and college teams across football, hockey, basketball, soccer and beyond,
- Find sports updates for the United States and international sports. 
- Follow your favorites so you never miss sports scores or stats.

UNMATCHED SPORTS PODCASTS:
- Follow and listen to a variety of sports podcasts on your favorite leagues
- Discover daily podcasts like “The Athletic Football Show”, “The Audible” and “No Dunks”.

CONNECTIONS: SPORTS EDITION
- Play The Athletic’s daily game for sports fans. 
- Group sports terms that share a common thread.

STAY UP TO DATE ON YOUR SPORTS:
- Keep track of which NFL teams are in contention for the playoffs and follow to see if the Eagles can remain on top.
- Catch all the MLB action with live scores, breaking news and in-depth coverage to see if the Dodgers can repeat their World Series win.
- Stay up to date on all NHL hockey scores, games and news for the Stanley Cup Defending Oilers.
- Don’t miss any NBA highlights and news from this upcoming season and see if the Thunder can defend their NBA Championship win.
- What school will reign supreme from March Madness to the NCAA Football Championships? Don’t miss a score or stat update.
- Stay updated on every swing from the PGA Tour to see who can stay in the lead.
- Who in the Big Six will triumph in the Premier League this year, and can Liverpool defend their title?
- Follow Argentina, Spain and France as they compete for the FIFA World Cup next summer.
- Stay up to speed on Formula 1, NASCAR, Indy Car, MotoGP and World Rally.


Terms of Service: https://help.nytimes.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014893428-Terms-of-Service 

Privacy Policy: https://help.nytimes.com/hc/en-us/articles/10940941449492-The-New-York-Times-Company-Privacy-Policy

apps.title: WMUR News 9 - New Hampshire
apps.description:
Take the WMUR News 9 app with you everywhere you go and be the first to know of breaking news happening in Manchester and the surrounding area. Always stay up to date with the latest local news, national, sports, traffic, political, entertainment stories and much more. Download the WMUR News 9 app for free today.

Our Local News, Weather and Sports App Features Include:
- Manchester breaking news alerts with push notifications
- Live streaming breaking news updates from our WMUR News 9 reporters when it happens, where it happens
- Local news submission area for breaking news, news tips and the ability to email your news photos and videos right to our newsroom to be featured on air
- Share stories via email or your social media pages
- Up to date, current local weather conditions, hourly Manchester weather updates, and 7 day forecasts
- An interactive radar that lets you zoom in and out to street level and watch storms as they approach. Move the map around to see major weather activity 
- Manchester weather alerts and updates, Storm Watch 9 weather videocasts and more

Although Hearst Television believes the majority of its news content is appropriate for a variety of ages, it is intended for individuals 18 and older.

apps.title: TheJournal.ie News
apps.description:
#1 Free News App in Ireland

The Journal is Ireland’s most popular online news source. Our multi-award winning team delivers breaking news, hard-hitting investigations and smart commentary on the issues that matter to you. We explain, we factcheck, we listen through interactive and multimedia storytelling, all in a user-friendly format.

You can choose to use The Journal for free or you can support our independent journalism with a subscription. As a subscriber you also get The Journal ad-free. Check out our Terms of Use for all details on using The Journal (https://www.thejournal.ie/terms/).


*********************************************************

Awards for our journalism:
Daphne Caruana Galizia Prize 2024
The Mary Raftery Prize for outstanding social affairs journalism 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023
Media Literacy Ireland, Media Champion 2023
The Irish Red Cross Humanitarian  Journalism Award 2022, 2021, 2020
New York Festival of Radio, Gold medallist, Best Documentary Podcast 2020
Celtic Media Festival, Best Radio Documentary 2020
Justice Media Awards, multiple, 2016-2025 


***********
“Really impressed by The Journal …and its focus on citizen storytelling” - Mark Little, founder of Storyful, Kinzen
"Best Addition to Irish Media" - Ian Dempsey
“A valuable public service” - John FitzGerald, ESRI


**********


> Download now for Free


FEATURES:

- Trustworthy breaking news and opinion from Ireland and beyond
- Get only the most important news alerts straight to your phone
- Clear-sighted analysis and explainers to guide you through hot topics
- Submit photos, video and tips directly to our journalists from your device
- Listen to award-winning podcasts such as The Explainer, Stardust and The Candidate  in-app
- Vote in our daily topical polls
- Send a question to Ireland’s only verified FactCheck team
- Submit story ideas to The Journal Investigates 
- Hear the diverse stories of a modern Ireland in our Voices opinion section
- Contribute to and read our popular Money Diaries, Sitdown Sunday and other weekly features
- Test out our fun and informative news quizzes
- Join our comments community
- Share articles directly from the app to your social networks, to email and your messaging apps
- Sign up for our behind-the-scenes newsletters on the climate crisis, public health, misinformation and more
- Find brilliant sports storytelling from our sister publication The42

Follow us on instagram.com/thejournal_ie, facebook.com/thejournal.ie, tiktok.com/@thejournal_ie, X.com/thejournal_ie,  for latest updates

apps.title: PressReader: News & Magazines
apps.description:
Read 7,000+ of the world’s most popular newspapers and magazines on your iPhone or iPad. Enjoy unlimited reading on up to 3 devices with a 7-day free trial of PressReader Premium. 

PressReader is the best way to read your favorite magazines and newspapers in one place—from local stories to global news, and everything in between. Download complete issues and switch between the original print view and a mobile-optimized text view. Bring it all to life with Auto-Translate to over 30 languages or listen to stories with our text-to-speech features.  
 
Subscribe to PressReader Premium to get unlimited access to most publications in the catalog or purchase single issues of your favorite title. Individual subscriptions for some publications are also available. To access PressReader without a subscription, visit one of our HotSpot partners. 
  
“PressReader delivers an authentic multi-platform newspaper-reading experience” – TNW 
  
“I found it especially useful for keeping up with international news, which often offers viewpoints you won’t find in US media.” – LIFEHACKER 
   
“Anyone with even a passing interest in the news should give PressReader a try” – CNET 
   
“A sleeping giant in the digital media landscape” – INC. 
 
“If you love newspapers but hate inky fingers and creepy delivery people, you might be interested in taking a gander at PressReader” – TECHCRUNCH 
  
Terms of Use: https://www.pressreader.com/help/termsofuse 
Privacy Policy: https://www.pressreader.com/help/privacypolicy 
  
Support 
- Newspapers and magazines can be translated in up to 32 different languages 
- Monthly subscription payment is charged to a user’s iTunes account at confirmation of purchase 
- Monthly subscriptions will renew automatically unless renewals are disabled in account settings 
 
TOP NEWSPAPERS 
  
The Washington Post, The Guardian, National Post, Los Angeles Times, New York Post, The Globe and Mail, The Herald, The Irish Times, China Daily, USA Today, Le Figaro, Le Journal de Montreal, Toronto Star, El Pais, The Daily Telegraph, Chicago Tribune, The Philadelphia Inquirer, The Washington Times, San Francisco Chronicle, Boston Globe, The Dallas Morning News, Miami Herald, Chicago Sun-Times, Houston Chronicle, The Mercury News 
 
TOP MAGAZINES 
  
BUSINESS & NEWS: Forbes, Newsweek International, Robb Report, The Economist, Business Traveler, The Monthly, Financial Post Magazine, Bloomberg Businessweek, Fast Company, Inc. 
  
FASHION: VOGUE, Glamour, Cosmopolitan, GQ, Esquire, ELLE, Fashion, Harper's Bazaar, Wallpaper, Grazia 
  
ENTERTAINMENT: Variety, Q Magazine, Empire, Top Gear, Reader's Digest, Daily Mail Weekend Magazine, Total Film, Rolling Stone, Cosmopolitan, The New York Review of Books, US Weekly 
  
LIFESTYLE & TRAVEL: Lonely Planet, Esquire, Canadian Geographic, Maxim, DNA, Where Milan, National Geographic Traveller, New York Magazine, Backpacker, Oncuba Travel 
  
FOOD & HOME: Canadian Living, BBC Good Food Magazine, VOGUE Living Australia, Quick & Easy, Style at Home, Good Housekeeping, Taste of Home, BBC Easy Cook Magazine 
  
SPORTS & FITNESS: Men's Health, Women's Health, Yoga Journal, Runner's World, Better Nutrition, The Hockey News, Ladies in Racing, MiNDFOOD, Golf Digest, Men's Fitness, Oxygen 
   
TECHNOLOGY & GAMING: PC Gamer, Popular Science, Science Illustrated, T3, iPhone Life Magazine, Air & Space Smithsonian, TechLife Australia, PCWorld, Macworld 
  
Connect With Us: 
Web: https://www.pressreader.com 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pressreader 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pressreader 
X: https://x.com/pressreader 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/pressreader 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pressreader

apps.title: MxM News
apps.description:
MxM News delivers curated news that cuts through the censorship, mainstream bias, and institutional dominance that has left society divided and misinformed. The platform allows readers to access the news that matters, particularly when it is being ignored. Updated minute-by-minute with news coverage from a diversity of publications and topics, readers have a one stop to be informed and stay informed.  

MXM News EULA/Terms of Use
https://mxmnews.io/terms

apps.title: theScore: Sports News & Scores
apps.description:
Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app!
 
theScore brings you news, scores, stats and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition!
 
theScore delivers real-time scoring updates and alerts, breaking news, the deepest in-game stats, videos, and social content. theScore is fast, comprehensive, and super simple to use:
 
*FAVORITES - This is YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favorite teams, players and leagues. Tap ‘Manage’ to add, delete or reorder your favorites. Never miss a key moment when you set-up your notifications!
 
*SCORES - A live view of every game updated in real-time. Select the matchup for the full boxscore, including team and player stats, odds and lines, last plays, news, and more.
 
*CHAT & MESSAGING - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features and connect with other fans around the leagues, teams and games you care about. 
 
*DISCOVER - Stay in the know on the biggest social stories and multimedia content that’s got sports fans talking! 
 
*NEWS - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant across all sports, including comprehensive fantasy analysis, and more.
 
*LEAGUES - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for all the sports you care about. 
 
theScore offers deep coverage and real-time alerts for every major league and competition, including:
 
- Football (NFL Football, NCAA Football, and CFL Football, regular season and playoffs)
- Baseball (College World Series and MLB Baseball, season play and playoffs)
- Basketball (NBA Basketball, WNBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball - including the NCAA Men’s Basketball Tournament and playoffs)
- Hockey (NHL Hockey, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)
- Soccer (Premier League Soccer, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, - FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)
- Golf (PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)
- Tennis (ATP, WTA), with the US Open coming in August
- Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)
- Auto Racing (NASCAR Sprint Cup, Formula 1)
- Lacrosse (NLL)
 
__
 
Need help, have feedback or want to request a new feature? Contact us via the Settings menu or email us via support@thescore.com. You can also chat to us on Twitter via @theScoreHelp.
 
Website: www.thescore.com
Privacy Policy: www.thescore.com/pages/privacy
Terms of Use: www.thescore.com/pages/terms
 
Visit www.scoremediaandgaming.com for more information and other apps.

raw_data.releaseNotes: General performance enhancements and bug fixes. Love using theScore? Leave us a review - we read and respond to them all!

apps.title: Hindustan Times - Latest News
apps.description:
Stay informed with the latest updates from Hindustan Times, India’s premier source for reliable news. With over 100 years of exemplary journalism since 1924, we bring you the fastest breaking news and comprehensive coverage on politics, business, entertainment, sports, and more. Whether you're looking for live updates or in-depth analysis, our platform offers a truly immersive reading experience.

Why choose Hindustan Times? Our blend of editorial excellence and comprehensive coverage makes us the best news app in India. Our team of award-winning reporters and editors work tirelessly to provide unbiased, fact-checked reporting, ensuring you receive accurate news from the frontlines. With a personalized news feed based on your reading preferences, discover the content you care about, from live news to insightful columns and analysis.

Expect comprehensive coverage with dedicated sections:
- Politics & Governance: Stay updated on Parliament sessions, state elections, and policy changes.
- National News: Access breaking news stories from all 28 states and 8 Union Territories.
- World News: Understand international affairs, including US-India relations and global conflicts.
- Business & Economy: Stay ahead with updates on stock markets, startups, and personal finance tips.
- Technology: Discover the latest in AI, gadgets, and cybersecurity developments.
- Sports: Follow cricket (IPL, international), football, and Olympic events closely.
- Entertainment: Get the latest buzz on Bollywood, Hollywood, and OTT platforms.
- Lifestyle: Explore articles on health, travel, food, and much more.
- Cities: Enjoy hyperlocal news delivered directly from your city like Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, and Kolkata.
- Opinion & Analysis: Read expert columns and editorials from renowned journalists.

Key features of the Hindustan Times app:
- Live Breaking News Notifications: Get the fastest alerts for breaking news stories.
- Personalized News Feed: Tailor your news consumption according to your interests.
- Dark Mode: Enjoy comfortable reading during night hours.
- Multimedia Content: Access video news, podcasts, and photo galleries.
- Language Options: Experience the app in English, Bangla and Telgu
- E-paper Access: Subscribers get exclusive access to the electronic version of the newspaper.
- Ad-free Experience: Premium users enjoy reading without any interruptions.
- Shareable Content: Easily share articles across your social networks.
- Minimal Data Consumption: Fast loading times even with limited bandwidth.

Trust our legacy of over a century in delivering quality journalism. With a team known for investigative excellence, we combat misinformation and deliver verified news. Each article is crafted with integrity to uphold our commitment to unbiased reporting.

Join millions of readers and experience the future of news consumption. Download the Hindustan Times app today and enable notifications to never miss a beat.

Our continued success and credibility stem from our rich heritage and global recognition in journalism. Explore the app to see why thousands trust Hindustan Times for their daily news updates. 

Download now and experience the robust features and trusted journalism that makes Hindustan Times the best news app in India. Stay connected to the stories that matter most.

For any queries & suggestions, reach out at contact@hindustantimes.com
Terms of uhttps://www.hindustantimes.com/termsofuse
Privacy Policy: https://www.hindustantimes.com/privacy-policy
Subscription-Terms of use: https://www.hindustantimes.com/subscriber-agreement-and-terms-of-use

apps.title: Bleacher Report: Sports News
apps.description:
Up your sports fandom with the Bleacher Report app – fast sports alerts, sports scores, & exclusive content covering your favorite teams. Beyond scores & sports news, the B/R app is the destination to share your hottest takes & watch the next voices in sports news & culture with exclusive Bleacher Report shows & live content. Scroll through your favorite sports highlights, videos, articles, community posts, and more with the B/R app.

Sports news, shows, live sports scores, stats, & epic highlights of your favorite sports & teams. Get sports news alerts instantly, as stories break across the NBA, NFL news, MLB, WNBA, NHL, MLS soccer, college sports like NCAA football & all-world soccer teams. Stay current on the college sports news you love.

Get sports news alerts & flash notifications on the latest rumors, trades, sports news & stats, predictions & breaking stories for all the sports you love: NBA, NHL, NFL news, MLB highlights, WNBA, MLS, NCAA college football, & more.

Be a fantasy football champion with instant NFL news alerts, injury updates, stats & sports scores for your fantasy basketball team or fantasy football team to stay ahead of your competition; Fantasy football and all sports starts with Bleacher Report. Fantasy football & NFL news when you need it.

Pick your favorite teams, & instantly get the latest sports news, alerts, sport scores, & more personalized stats through a singular sports app designed for you! Sports stats and sports news for all sports!

NFL News Alerts, Full Game Recaps, Scores & Updates
• Get full game recaps and videos of the biggest NFL news from every NFL game
• NFL News & Updates instantly: Stay up to date on the latest NFL football news, trades, cuts & signings from the NFL season.
• Follow your team’s every move with the latest NFL news & NFL highlights for fantasy football or for fandom!
• Get all the NFL news, stats, scores & recaps, everything your fantasy football team needs to dominate

NBA Alerts, NBA Highlights, Basketball Stats, & News
• Follow along with the NBA!
• Keep up with the latest NBA free agent signings, storylines, expert analysis & more
• Sports News: Exclusive NBA basketball stats, League articles, & rankings
• Never miss a game of your favorite team with live NBA scores & NBA highlights

NCAA College Sports
• College Football season is here - stay on top of all NCAA college football news and action.
• From college to pro, all the college sports you love in one sports app. CFB scores all season long.
• NCAA football stats & CFB scores for every team
• College football news: Stay up to date on the latest NCAA football transfers, CFB scores, hires, & more during the off-season

MLB Scores, Alerts & MLB Highlights
• Never miss a moment from the postseason with MLB highlights and live MLB scores
• Keep track of all the latest updates with instant MLB Alerts during the season. Never miss an MLB highlight.
• Get your fantasy baseball team ready with all the MLB baseball stats, ranking & predictions you need and share MLB highlights.

WNBA Playoffs News, Predictions & Scores
• Follow the WNBA Playoffs with predictions and the latest updates
• Get the latest WNBA news, scores & sports alerts

NHL Alerts, News, and Highlights.
• Start the NHL season right with instant alerts, developing stories, and highlights
• Keep up with the latest NHL storylines, expert analysis & more

Soccer
• Get the latest soccer sports news, scores & sports alerts for your teams & players
• Never miss a major moment from every match
• Live scores & epic highlights for MLS, Premier League, UEFA Champions League, Europa League, La Liga & Bundesliga matches

Fan easier, fan better & fan faster with Bleacher Report with instant sports news alerts, fantasy football news & exclusive coverage on all your favorite NBA, NFL, MLB, WNBA, NHL, MLS, all-world soccer teams, and NCAA Sports like College football! All sports stats in one place!

apps.title: Bundle News: Breaking & Local
apps.description:
Bundle is the most comprehensive and top-rated free news aggregator that brings together all the latest news you need to know throughout the day. With Bundle, you have everything you shouldn't miss at your fingertips, featuring top headlines, breaking news, and a multitude of sources across different interest areas such as the stock market, science and technology, finance, sports, and politics.

• My Bundle - Ready to be added to your personal collection for free from over 10,000 news sources, online publishers, magazines, newspapers, opinion pieces, and blogs from 18 different countries. Stay informed and inspired by leading publications such as The Guardian, TIME, The New York Times, Business Insider, Bloomberg, Mashable, and more!

• Breaking news – With Bundle, you receive instant notifications for the day's most important developments and standout headlines, ensuring you stay informed before anyone else in a refined, accurate, and unbiased manner.

• Save time by summarizing news – Utilize Bundle AI, the productive artificial intelligence developed by Bundle, to summarize news content with just one touch. Instead of reading the entire news, you can quickly get to the most important points.

• Escape clickbait headlines – Bundle AI organizes deceptive and non-informative news headlines used by some outlets to gain more clicks, making the headlines more understandable for users.

• Unique search feature – Bundle provides instant results based on the keywords you search for. Easily search through all news, headlines, authors, and more.

• Reader Mode – If ads on the page of the media outlet you follow distract you, you can focus solely on content by switching to Reader Mode.

• Offline Mode – Whether you're on the subway or in a dead zone, you can continue reading all the content loaded into your news feed even if your connection is lost.

• Latest news – Bundle delivers the latest news to users instantly. With Bundle, you'll be the first to know the most popular and important news from various categories such as technology, sports, politics, economy, and science, tailored to your interests.

• The world at your fingertips – Read news and content from 18 different countries, including the UK, France, Germany, and worldwide, to stay informed about local agendas.

• Go beyond the agenda – With Hot Bundle, featuring the daily selections of Bundle editors, you access the most engaging, inspiring, and mind-opening content.

• Don't lose, save it – If you can't find time to read a piece of news immediately, save it and read it at your convenience.

• Easy to use, hard to let go – With Bundle's award-winning design and user-friendly interface, you can easily access the news you want and glance through all of it at once. If your internet quota is limited, you can turn off news images or use the dark theme option if white light strains your eyes. Log in with your social media account to synchronize your saved news and followed sources across all your devices.

Terms of Use and Privacy Agreement: https://www.bundletheworld.com/mobileapp/termsofuse/en

In addition to all of this, you can follow all developments related to both current events and Bundle on our Facebook, Instagram, and X accounts! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bundlenews/ X: https://twitter.com/bundleapp/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bundlehaber/

We would be delighted to hear any suggestions, comments, and questions you may have about Bundle: You can always reach us through the "Settings>Send Feedback" section in the app and at support@bundlenews.co. For more information, you can visit our website: www.bundle.app/en

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and minor improvements

apps.title: Yahoo Finance: Stocks & News
apps.description:
Your #1 finance destination to track the markets and the economy.

Follow the stocks you care about most and get personalized news and alerts. Access real-time stock information and investment updates to stay on top of the market.

Favorite features:
• Track the performance of your personal portfolio
• Use the portfolio tool to watch your crypto assets, to build investment strategies, or to learn how to invest
• Follow stocks, ETFs, or crypto to get real-time quotes and personalized news
• Discover detailed financial information such as historical financials, ESG ratings, and top holders
• Go beyond stocks and track crypto, currencies, bonds, commodities, equities, world indices, and futures
• Compare and evaluate stocks with interactive full screen charts
• Sign in to view and edit your web portfolio on the go

Helpful tips:
• Follow all the stocks you care about by searching for the ticker and tapping the star icon
• Create multiple watchlists to organize the stocks you follow
• Enable notifications for price alerts, breaking news, earnings reports, and more
• Sync your portfolios across devices

Privacy Policy: https://legal.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/index.html
Terms of Service: https://legal.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/index.html

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This release includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

As always, feel free to use the “Send feedback” link in the Account tab to share feedback. Thanks for using Yahoo Finance!

apps.title: Spectrum News: Local Stories
apps.description:
Spectrum News is your all-in-one destination for local news, weather forecasts and events. You let us know where you call home, and we customize your experience with stories and information that matter to you and your community.

Available for all Spectrum customers.* If you’re not a Spectrum customer, enjoy free access for 30 days.

GET HYPERLOCAL NEWS AND WEATHER

• Read, watch and listen to curated news stories by our Spectrum News journalists and local partner publications.
• Browse enhanced articles that help you understand local issues through original reporting, infographics, interactive maps, and much more.
• Watch on demand videos and exclusive series that uncover meaningful stories.
• Listen to original local podcasts that discuss what’s happening in your area.
• Get the latest weather forecasts from our meteorologists and explore interactive radar maps.
• Subscribe to weather notifications to get hyperlocal alerts based on your location.
• Discover breaking news happening near you.
• Stay up to date with the biggest events in your community and beyond.

FOLLOW YOUR INTERESTS

• Browse and follow topics you're interested in, including local politics, education, transit, health and more.
• Curate your news experience to see more of what matters to you.

WATCH SPECTRUM NEWS

• Watch live news from Spectrum News’ portfolio of local news networks.
• Spectrum News provides TV coverage in Kentucky, Massachusetts, New York City (NY1 & NY1 Noticias), New York State, North Carolina, Ohio, Central Florida (News 13), Southern California, Tampa (Bay News 9), Texas and Wisconsin.

INTRODUCING SPECTRUM NEWS+

• Now watch the latest news from across the country. Local stories connecting communities.
• Streaming free with your Spectrum subscription.

Spectrum News is your all-in-one destination for local news, weather forecasts and events. You let us know where you call home, and we customize your experience with stories and information that matter to you and your community.

Available for all Spectrum customers.* If you’re not a Spectrum customer, enjoy free access for 30 days.

GET HYPERLOCAL NEWS AND WEATHER

• Read, watch and listen to curated news stories by our Spectrum News journalists and local partner publications.
• Browse enhanced articles that help you understand local issues through original reporting, infographics, interactive maps, and much more.
• Watch on demand videos and exclusive series that uncover meaningful stories.
• Listen to original local podcasts that discuss what’s happening in your area.
• Get the latest weather forecasts from our meteorologists and explore interactive radar maps.
• Subscribe to weather notifications to get hyperlocal alerts based on your location.
• Discover breaking news happening near you.
• Stay up to date with the biggest events in your community and beyond.

FOLLOW YOUR INTERESTS

• Browse and follow topics you're interested in, including local politics, education, transit, health and more.
• Curate your news experience to see more of what matters to you.

WATCH SPECTRUM NEWS

• Watch live news from Spectrum News’ portfolio of local news networks.
• Spectrum News provides TV coverage in Kentucky, Massachusetts, New York City (NY1 & NY1 Noticias), New York State, North Carolina, Ohio, Central Florida (News 13), Southern California, Tampa (Bay News 9), Texas and Wisconsin.

INTRODUCING SPECTRUM NEWS+

• Now watch the latest news from across the country. Local stories connecting communities.
• Streaming free with your Spectrum subscription.
• Find Spectrum News+ in the Spectrum News app.

Your Privacy Rights: https://www.spectrum.com/policies/your-privacy-rights

apps.title: Indian Express News + Epaper
apps.description:
For over 90 years, The Indian Express has been read by those who have their own unique point of view of looking at things. With coverage based on comprehensive analysis, and with fearless reporting, we empower our readers with the truth behind every matter. We go the whole length to get to the crux of every issue. And we don't just stop there, but ferret out every detail that brings out the how, why, where and what next of the subject. So, our readers can formulate their own stands on issues in a bias-free manner. We are the Journalism of Courage.

Get on-the-go access to breaking news, India news, live coverage, photos, videos and more. The Indian Express is your one-stop solution for news on the go. Stay updated with Entertainment news, Tech news, Gadgets news, India news, Politics news, Sports news, Cricket news and Bollywood news. Get live news coverage on major events including sports, reviews, cricket and more.

Our revamped home feed gives you instant access to the latest news with an aggregated news experience across your most loved topics. This leads to better content discovery and performance, and also enhances the overall user experience on the Indian Express app through a clean, seamless and ad-free interface.

The key features of the Indian Express App are -

1. Collated news experience - The new home screen gives you the best news across your favourite sections i.e Latest news, Opinions, Audio, Videos, Technology, Entertainment and Sports in India and across the globe
2. Dedicated Audio/Video and Photos section - Experience the best podcasts, videos and photos from our rich library
3. ePaper - Get instant access to our e-newspapers and magazines
4. Offline Reading - Bookmark stories and read news in offline mode even without internet
5. Swipe for Next - Swiping left & right from the article page gives you instant access to other stories for a seamlessly reading experience
6. Share - Share stories with your friends using Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Email & more!


Indian Express is one of the largest english newspaper website in India, with an expanding repertoire and rapidly expanding presence. 

Write to us & share your feedback & suggestions at appsupport@indianexpress.com

By using this app, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/  
Privacy Policy: https://indianexpress.com/privacy-policy/
Terms & Conditions: https://indianexpress.com/terms-and-conditions/

apps.title: 16 WAPT Breaking News Leader
apps.description:
This WAPT 16 News app provides you with real-time access to breaking news, weather, sports, politics and more straight from Jackson, Mississippi. Watch live breaking news when it happens and get live updates from our reporters right from the scene. Get breaking news notifications to be the first to know. Plus submit news tips or email your news photos and videos right to our newsroom and it could be featured on air. Stay up to date with local weather using our interactive radar map. Watch the radar futurecast to see hurricanes, storm warnings, thunderstorms and more. You can zoom in to street level and watch storms as they approach your home and zoom out to view the whole country. Check out our current conditions, hourly forecast and daily videocasts from your favorite meteorologist.
 
Although Hearst Television believes the majority of its news content is appropriate for a variety of ages, it is intended for individuals 18 and older.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: AJC News
apps.description:
AJC NEWS
Stay informed, connected and up to date with the AJC News app from The Atlanta Journal-Constitution. Our intuitive, responsive app provides you with in-depth news and personalized real-time news alerts. This app is free to download. 


EASY TO NAVIGATE
Multiple ways to navigate to the content that is important to you. 

The homepage of the app provides all the latest content as you scroll down the page. 

Improved ribbon navigation is available on each page so that you can easily navigate to all sections and subsections of content. 

Dedicated section menus include the ability to search for content within the app. 


LOCAL AND NATIONAL NEWS FOR YOU
Choose the news essential to you. We provide in-depth local coverage for your neighborhood, Atlanta and more as well as help understand how national and world news can impact Georgia and the Southeast. 

Enjoy our enhanced sections that include more of the AJC content you enjoy from daily politics, the best Atlanta restaurants, and sports coverage. 

Your news, your way – enjoy mobile-friendly formatting or turn to the ePaper format. It’s all in the app.

Now you can also create a playlist of articles and listen to them while the app is in the background. 


REAL-TIME ALERTS
Be in the know with our Breaking News alerts. 

It is now easier than ever to personalize the content that is pushed to your device. In the future we will present you with additional popular topics to follow. 


WATCH & LISTEN
Create your playlist and listen to content while the app is in the background. Watch the latest news videos and series from AJC Films. Explore all our podcasts: 

Breakdown 				
Politically Georgia 			
Braves Report 
Hawks Report 				
Southern Fried Soccer 			
Bow Tie Chronicles 
Voices of King 				
HBCU Journeys 


ENJOY PUZZLES AND GAMES
Play a game or complete a puzzle while listening to one of the great Atlanta Journal-Constitution podcasts or when you simply want a diversion. 


PAYMENT AND AUTO-RENEWAL + AUTOPAY TERMS:
IF YOU SUBSCRIBE TO THE ATLANTA JOURNAL-CONSTITUTION VIA THIS APP, PAYMENT WILL BE CHARGED BY APPLE TO YOUR APPLE ID ACCOUNT AT CONFIRMATION OF PURCHASE. YOUR APPLE ID ACCOUNT WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY CHARGED FOR RENEWAL AT THE APPLICABLE RATE SHOWN PLUS TAX (IF ANY) TO YOU AT THE TIME OF SUBSCRIPTION EVERY CALENDAR MONTH (FOR MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTIONS) WITHIN 24 HOURS PRIOR TO THE END OF THE CURRENT BILLING PERIOD. YOU WILL BE CHARGED IN ADVANCE EACH MONTH. YOUR SUBSCRIPTION WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW EACH MONTH UNLESS IT IS CANCELED AT LEAST 24 HOURS BEFORE THE END OF THE CURRENT PERIOD. TO CANCEL, PLEASE TURN OFF AUTO-RENEW AT LEAST 24 HOURS BEFORE THE END OF THE CURRENT PERIOD. YOU CAN TURN OFF AUTO-RENEW AT ANY TIME FROM YOUR APPLEID ACCOUNT SETTINGS ON YOUR IOS DEVICE. CANCELLATION TAKES EFFECT AT THE END OF THE CURRENT BILLING PERIOD. 

BY DOWNLOADING THE ATLANTA JOURNAL-CONSTITUTION NEWS APP, you agree to: 
•	The payment and auto-renewal autopay terms stated above. 
•	The Atlanta Journal-Constitution Terms of Use - https://www.ajc.com/visitor-agreement/
•	The Atlanta Journal-Constitution Subscription Terms of Sale - https://www.ajc.com/subterms/
•	The Atlanta Journal-Constitution Privacy Policy - https://www.ajc.com/subterms/
•	The Atlanta Journal-Constitution California Privacy Policy - https://www.ajc.com/frequently-asked-questions/california-privacy-notice/645OMK7TLBC4XPXVXFPG5FMERE/
•	Apple Terms of Sale - https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/


* Introductory offers are for new Apple subscribers only. Smartphone and tablet apps are not supported on all devices. AJC News app subscriptions may not include select content and some content may be available without a subscription; content is subject to change. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Offer terms subject to change. Other restrictions apply.

apps.title: Vikatan: Tamil News & Magazine
apps.description:
Vikatan App is India’s one of the leading daily Tamil news and magazine publishing app, delivering exclusive news articles, breaking news updates, and in-depth analyses across various categories, specially curated for Tamil speakers worldwide.

The Vikatan App offers access to 8 beloved premium Vikatan magazines, enabling you to download single issues or subscribe to your favorites. Stay updated with the latest news, politics, current affairs, Tamil cinema & more in an easy-to-read format, tailored for the smart Global Tamilian.

This app includes a daily selection of our best journalism, digital editions of our premium tamil news articles, short news, magazines and an exclusive collection of tamil audiobooks.

Get extensive News Coverage on:

-> Latest Tamil News:  Keep yourself updated with the daily news in Tamil, including Tamil Nadu news, political updates, sports news, cinema news, and more. Get coverage on a wide range of topics like technology, fashion, lifestyle, finance, astrology & more news updates in Tamil.

-> Trending & Viral News: Get the latest viral news, trending Tamil news, and Tamil Short News in just 60 seconds, including updates on your local district and major stories happening now.

-> Specialized Sections: Enjoy in-depth updates on politics, Tamil movie news, reviews, gossip, live cricket scores, and sports news Tamil, plus gold & silver rates and NSE/BSE market updates.

Features:

-> Exclusive Tamil audiobooks and series (Vikatan Play)
-> Personalized section based news updates.
-> Notifications alerts of important breaking news in Tamil 24x7.
-> 30 days free trial for all Vikatan magazines.
-> Read 30+ in-depth articles and 70+ news content daily, written by our expert journalists on relevant topics.
-> Download various e-book collections in our app and read it later.
-> Save your favorite article, review or video in the My Bookmarks section.
-> Play your favourite daily word game Soliyadi, Solvalam & more.
-> Listen to magazine content on the go.
-> In-app search functionality seamlessly directs you to the news you want to read.
-> Chat with our customer care for any feedback related to content or subscription plans.
-> Download your favourite magazine and access each issue offline at your leisure.

Subscription Benefits:

-> Ad-free experience on Vikatan app & web
-> Access 8 premium magazines incl. Ananda, Junior & Naanayam Vikatan
-> Explore years of Vikatan archives & treasures

Why do you subscribe to Vikatan Magazine?

-> Ananda Vikatan – Tamil Nadu’s No.1 entertainment magazine, offering diverse content on politics, cinema, literature, and arts.

-> Junior Vikatan – Popularly called “Juvi,” this biweekly is Tamil Nadu’s best-selling socio-political investigative magazine.

-> Aval Vikatan – A women-centric fortnightly featuring empowering essays, inspiring stories, and insightful articles tailored for the modern woman.

-> Shakthi Vikatan – Published during auspicious full moon and new moon days, this fortnightly celebrates Tamil traditions and enriches readers’ spiritual journey.

-> Naanayam Vikatan – A trusted weekly for personal finance and business insights, helping readers make smarter money decisions.

-> Pasumai Vikatan - This agricultural fortnightly welcomes readers with the latest developments in the field of organic farming, animal husbandry and fisheries.

-> Motor Vikatan - Motor Vikatan is the No. 1 automobile magazine in Tamil Nadu; this premium monthly is equipped with breathtaking photographs and top notch automobile content for the motor heads of Tamil Nadu.

-> Vikatan Plus - Offers premium Tamil content—exclusive news, stories, serial novels, true events, politics, entertainment, and more.

Download & install the Vikatan App to explore a wide array of news categories tailored for Tamil speakers worldwide.

apps.title: Apple Podcasts
apps.description:
Discover podcasts that entertain, inform, and inspire. Get recommendations curated by Apple Podcasts editors and dive deep into what interests you most. Seamlessly sync your shows across Apple devices.

Features:

• Explore new shows with personalized recommendations. 
• Find trending shows and episodes by category with Top Charts. 
• Find the best of what’s new and popular in podcasting with curated collections from Apple editors.
• Follow and save your favorite shows to your library. 
• Use playback controls to build and manage your queue, control playback speed, and set sleep timers.
• Hear voices in episodes more clearly with Enhance Dialogue.
• Add your favorite categories to find shows that map to your unique tastes.
• Access subscriber-only content, from the biggest names to the top independents.
• Connect subscriptions to access shows from Apple Music, Apple News, and other top apps. 
• Read along with a transcript as your episode plays.
• Share a specific moment in an episode from the transcript.
• Get new episode notifications from shows you follow.
• Download episodes and listen offline.
• Pick up where you left off with seamless syncing across your Apple devices.
• Listen on-the-go with CarPlay and Apple Watch.
• Use customizable widgets to listen with just one tap.

Availability and features vary by country and region, plan, or device. https://support.apple.com/HT204411

Apple Podcasts app Terms and Conditions can be found at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/

apps.title: WCVB NewsCenter 5 - Boston
apps.description:
Stay connected to Boston with the WCVB Newscenter 5 app!

Be the first to know about breaking news, weather updates, and top stories in Boston and the surrounding area. With the WCVB NewsCenter 5 app, you’ll have real-time news, sports highlights, traffic alerts, and entertainment updates – all at your fingertips. Download for free today and experience news like never before.
Trusted by nearly 400,000 users across Boston and New England, the WCVB NewsCenter 5 app is the go-to source for breaking news, weather updates, and more. Join the growing community today!

LIVE NEWS

 - Get instant push notifications for breaking news.
 - Launch full live newscasts using the Nowcast bar.
 - Catch up on the latest newscast with On Demand playback.
 - Stay updated with Boston sports results and highlights, including dedicated segments in every newscast.

REAL-TIME WEATHER

 - Stay updated with current weather conditions and hourly forecasts.
 - Plan ahead with a detailed 10-day outlook and weekend forecast.
 - Zoom in to street-level detail with an interactive radar.
 - Receive critical weather warnings and expert videocasts.

COMMUNITY FOCUSED

 - Submit news tips, photos, and videos directly to our newsroom.
 - Share stories easily via email, text, or social media.
 - Explore local New England stories with Chronicle, the region's longest-running news magazine series.
 - Stay informed with in-depth coverage of local stories and events that matter to your community.
 - Keep up with the Red Sox, Celtics, Patriots, Bruins, Revolution and your local college and high school teams with the latest coverage and highlights.

STAY AHEAD WITH WCVB NEWSCENTER 5

Whether it's breaking news, live weather updates, or the latest from the world of sports and entertainment, the WCVB NewsCenter 5 app delivers the information that matters most to you.

DOWNLOAD NOW AND STAY CONNECTED TO YOUR COMMUNITY.

Although Hearst Television believes the majority of its news content is appropriate for a variety of ages, it is intended for individuals 18 and older.

apps.title: WTNH News 8
apps.description:
News has never been more local than in the palm of your hand. The WTNH News 8 mobile app brings you all the top stories from our daily broadcasts, as well as stories developing in real time.

Connecticut news, weather, traffic & more!  Stay up to date with the latest information, get breaking news, and watch live newscasts from News 8, Connecticut's News Leader.

FEATURES:
• Watch video of your trusted reporters on the scene, and read revealing articles on what's going on in your community.
• Plan your day and week with detailed weather reports, live alerts of severe conditions, and an interactive radar map.
• Optional alerts on breaking news keep you in the know.
• On the go? Save stories for later to access at your convenience.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've fixed some bugs and improved general performance.

apps.title: NBC 4 New York: News & Weather
apps.description:
The NBC 4 New York news and weather app connects you with local news, local weather and a free, 24/7 streaming news channel. Free to download and to use, the app delivers NYC breaking news alerts and weather alerts for your location that can be customized and easily managed in the app settings. 

The app gives you access to New York local news from the award-winning NBC 4 New York news team, covering the issues and concerns most important to Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Staten Island, Long Island, New Jersey and Connecticut residents. The Storm Team 4 weather team delivers accurate local forecasts that keep app users safe and informed while on the go. Access a powerful weather radar and customize the weather screen based on your preferences. 

The NBC 4 New York local app helps you stay informed with the following features:

New York & Tri-State Area Weather 
+ Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange 
+ Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts 
+ Live StormTracker 4 weather radar with exclusive features and data
+ 10-day forecasts for your New York region 
+ Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable graph
+ NYC local weather maps and radar  
+ NYC local weather forecast data that includes UV index, air quality and other live weather conditions 
+ Weather alerts for every location you save in the app
+ Weather closings for NYC and tri-state area schools
+ Weather news videos from your local meteorologists

New York News Alerts 
+ Alerts for NY local news, national headlines and world news that can be personalized and managed in the app settings
+ Top news of the day, covering breaking news, politics, weather and urgent product recalls 
+ Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order
+ Alerts center that shows you the most urgent NYC stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications
+Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in NY local news and pop culture 

NBC New York News 24/7 Streaming Channel
+ Free 24/7 NBC NY news streaming channel
+ Live NBC 4 New York newscasts 
+ Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in NYC
+ Entertainment and lifestyle videos from Access, Open House, New York Live, In the Wings and George to the Rescue
+ Dedicated video page with the latest video feed 

Create an NBC New York Account
 + Save articles and videos to view later
 + Sync preferences and newsletter subscriptions across NBC platforms

NBC New York I-Team Investigations & More
+ Investigative stories from local and award-winning NYC journalists
+ Consumer reports from “Better Get Baquero”
+ Sports news from NBC Sports Regional Sports Networks
+ Business news, finance news and stock market news from CNBC
+ Entertainment and celebrity news from E! Online and Access 
+ Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY show


NBC 4 New York is the flagship station of the NBCUniversal Local division of NBCUniversal, serving the New York tri-state area for more than 75 years. The team of journalists includes the NBC 4 I-Team, New York’s largest televised investigative reporting unit, Better Get Baquero, which has recovered more than $9 million for tri-State consumers and Storm Team 4, certified by WeatheRate for delivering the tri-state’s most accurate local weather forecast using cutting-edge technology such as Storm Tracker 4, a high-frequency S-Band dual polarization fixed Doppler weather radar. 

The NBC 4 New York news and weather app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC_New_York/ 
CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_New_York

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
- You can now create a free account in the app. By signing in with your NBCUniversal Profile, you’ll be able to save articles and videos to view later, and manage your newsletter subscriptions across NBCUniversal platforms.
- This update also includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Please rate our app in the App Store and send your feedback to WNBCappfeedback@nbcuni.com.

apps.title: New Orleans News from WWL
apps.description:
Stay up-to-date with the latest news and weather in the New Orleans area on the all-new free WWL TV app. 

Our app features the latest breaking news that impacts you and your family, interactive weather and radar, and live video from our newscasts and local events.

LOCAL & BREAKING NEWS
• Receive real-time notifications for breaking news
• Read the latest news as it happens in your area
• Explore exclusive investigative stories
• Browse photos, news clips, and raw video

LOCAL WEATHER
• Daily and hourly forecasts for your city
• The latest forecasts from our meteorologists
• Interactive radar maps
• Sign up for government-issued severe weather alerts in your area

LIVE VIDEO
• Watch live video newscasts and breaking news from WWL

PERSONALIZATION
• Discover and dive into topics that matter to you
• Favorite topics to receive personalized updates

Other Features:
• Share stories & videos directly with your friends and family
• See the latest updates and behind the scenes photos from your favorite anchors and reporters
• Get information on school delays & closings as they happen
• Cast videos and livestreams directly to your TV or streaming device, so you can lean back and enjoy your favorite programming on your biggest screen.

This is the official app of WWL and WWLTV.com, the CBS affiliate serving the New Orleans area.

Got feedback? Let us know how we can make this the best app experience for you! Send us a note at appfeedback@tegna.com.

Privacy Policy: https://www.wwltv.com/privacy
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.wwltv.com/do-not-sell-my-information
Terms of Service: https://www.wwltv.com/terms

apps.title: cleveland.com
apps.description:
cleveland.com reports on the stories and events that have a direct impact on your world. Stay connected with the most important local news you need from a name you know and trust. Timely and reliable reporting, always available whenever and wherever you are.

Our reporters, editors and photographers live and work in the very same communities as you and know firsthand just how important it is to be informed and aware of the world that’s unfolding right in your own backyard. Whether your interests are the latest in news, sports, politics, business, culture, and so much more, we’ve always got you covered.

Our All Access subscription provides you unlimited access to all of our premium content and the best local news and sports coverage.

Monthly Subscription: $9.99
Annual Subscription: $99.99

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

Your subscriptions may be managed (and auto-renewal can be turned off) by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

If we offer a free trial, any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

Our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
http://www.advance.net/advancedigitalUserAgreementPP/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
A fresh, redesigned app experience, making your timely, reliable and local news faster and easier to read. 

In this release, we've focused on the reading experience: easier-to-read resizable text, support for dark mode, richer layouts, and improved performance throughout.  Thank you for reading!

apps.title: WHIO News
apps.description:
WHIO-TV Channel 7 is serving the Dayton-Miami Valley Area coverage you can count on as it happens with our 24/7 news app. Dig deeper on the major news of the day with our live and on-demand videos to keep you plugged in to what’s happening now. 

WHIO-TV Channel 7 is your guide to: 


Minute-by-minute weather using WHIO-TV Channel 7’s StormTracker Doppler Radar and 5-day Forecast so you know how the weather will impact you. 
Getting where you need to go on time with live drive times in and out of the  Dayton Metro Area.
Direct sports coverage of the OSU Buckeyes, Cincinnati Bengals, Cleveland Browns, Dayton Flyers, and more.
Local news that matters for Greene, Miami, and Montgomery counties including Dayton, Kettering,  Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Centerville, Miamisburg, and West Carrollton.  
National and world news and what it means for you. 
Engaging content that you can share easily from the app to Twitter and Facebook.

Get accessible coverage that keeps you up-to-date with WHIO-TV Channel 7. 

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Please note: This app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

raw_data.releaseNotes: This release version contains some bug fixes and general improvements to enhance your viewing experience.

apps.title: TuneIn Radio: Music & Sports
apps.description:
Listen to All the Audio You Love, All in One Place

Access over 100,000 live AM/FM radio stations from around the world, plus exclusive content from news, sports, music, podcasts, and audiobooks—all across your devices. Enjoy a broader range of audio than Pandora or iHeartRadio, all in one place.

Your Personalized Soundtrack

Tune in to your favorite live stations or explore 100,000+ AM/FM stations from 197+ countries. Whether you’re in the mood for Today’s Hits, Classic Rock, Smooth Jazz, or something else, TuneIn has you covered—offering more variety and control than platforms like Pandora or iHeartRadio. Discover legendary stations like 106.7 Lite FM, Power 105.1, 102.7 KIIS-FM, and more.

Apple Music Radio now on TuneIn

Apple Music Radio has landed. Stream Apple Music 1, Chill, Country, Club & Hits live on TuneIn. Catch your favorite artists like Billie Eilish, Ed Sheeran, The Weeknd, Frank Ocean and more.

Stay Informed with Trusted News

Get the latest headlines and live updates from top news sources like CNN, FOX News Radio, MSNBC, Bloomberg Radio, CNBC, NPR, and BBC. Access 24/7 news, including local, national, and global coverage. Stream news stations such as WNYC-FM, KQED-FM, and WTOP Washington DC, or stay informed with top podcasts like The Daily and Up First.

All Your Favorite Sports

From MLB and NFL to NHL and college sports, catch every game and never miss a play. With TuneIn, follow your team all season long with curated content and game-time notifications. Stream sports talk stations like ESPN Radio, talkSPORT, Fox Sports Radio, and local shows. Plus, enjoy on-demand sports podcasts like Undisputed, First Take, and The Bill Simmons Podcast.

Podcasts for Every Passion

Explore the world’s most popular podcasts, including Stuff You Should Know, Hidden Brain, Wow in the World, and more. Whether commuting, working out, or unwinding, TuneIn offers top global podcasts that you can stream on-demand.

Stream Everywhere, Anytime

Take TuneIn with you wherever you go. Listen on iOS, tablets, or connected devices. Control your audio experience with Amazon Alexa, Google Home, or in your car with CarPlay and compatible vehicles like Tesla, Mercedes, and Volvo.

Unlock Even More with TuneIn Premium

Upgrade to TuneIn Premium for ad-free content, exclusive features, and more:

Live Sports: Commercial-free coverage of NHL games, college sports, racing, and more—without blackouts.
Ad-Free News: Enjoy uninterrupted news coverage from CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio, and more.
Unlimited Audiobooks: Access over 100,000 audiobooks with no extra cost or limitations.
Commercial-Free Music: Stream your favorite music stations non-stop with no ads.
Fewer Ads Across All Stations: Enjoy listening to 100,000+ stations with fewer interruptions than Pandora or iHeartRadio.

Subscribe to TuneIn Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly or annual subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month or year at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly or annually according to your subscription. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies

TuneIn uses Nielsen measurement software which allows you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. To learn more about Nielsen’s products and your privacy, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We are working hard to make some updates and improvements so you can have a better listening experience.

Enjoying TuneIn? Let us know! Just share your review in the App Store. For technical help, please email support@tunein.com.

apps.title: WSB-TV News
apps.description:
Channel 2 Action News App delivers coverage you can count on in North Georgia. Explore important local stories that impact you and your community with 24/7 coverage from the major news of the day to local investigations, on-demand videos, and live newscast stream.

The Channel 2 Action News App is your guide to:

•	Important  local stories from Cobb, Fulton, Dekalb, Gwinnett, Clayton, Cherokee,  Barrow, Bartow, Carroll, Clayton, Douglas, Fayette, Forsyth, Hall, Henry, Coweta, Spalding, Newton, Paulding, Rockdale, and Walton counties.
•	Getting where you need to go on time with live drive times in and out of the Atlanta Metro Area.
•	Tracking storms minute-by-minute with StormTracker 2 HD radar and 24/7 access to the 5-day forecast so you know how the weather will impact your day. 
•	Local sports coverage of the Atlanta Falcons, Atlanta Braves, Atlanta Hawks, Atlanta United, and more. 
•	The latest national and world news and how it impacts Georgia. 
•	Engaging content that you can share easily from the app to Twitter and Facebook.

Get accessible coverage that keeps you up-to-date with WSB-TV Channel 2 News. 

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. apps.title: Volv - Curated 9-Second News
apps.description:
Not your parents’ news app.
Volv curates the most interesting, viral and important content and delivers it to you in 9-second articles using AI.

“The Media Industry Needs To Pay Attention” - Forbes
“TikTok for news” - Business Insider

Also seen in The Information, Entrepreneur & more.

Welcome to the world of Volv. A digital detox that still keeps you updated on what’s happening without getting sucked into the social media vortex. It makes you feel intellectually stimulated while relaxing on an oasis of calm in this chaotic world. We capture the zeitgeist of this generation - like what’s the next IT shoe after the Adidas sambas? Or is micro-cheating really considered cheating? Is tween skincare a thing? What do europeans really think about Americans? What is the new dream job for everyone? We got you covered because we know what you’re going to read even before you do.

What you can expect on Volv:

apps.title: Buffalo News from WGRZ
apps.description:
Stay up-to-date with the latest news and weather in the Buffalo and Western New York region on the all-new free WGRZ2 app from WGRZ. 

Our app features the latest breaking news that impacts you and your family, interactive weather and radar, and live video from our newscasts and local events.

LOCAL & BREAKING NEWS
• Receive real-time notifications for breaking news
• Read the latest news as it happens in your area
• Explore exclusive investigative stories
• Browse photos, news clips, and raw video

LOCAL WEATHER
• Daily and hourly forecasts for your city
• The latest forecasts from our meteorologists
• Interactive radar maps
• Automated hyperlocal severe weather alerts

LIVE VIDEO
• Watch live video newscasts and breaking news from WGRZ

PERSONALIZATION
• Discover and dive into topics that matter to you
• Favorite topics to receive personalized updates

Other Features:
• Share stories & videos directly with your friends and family
• See the latest updates and behind the scenes photos from your favorite anchors and reporters
• Get information on school delays & closings as they happen
• Cast videos and livestreams directly to your TV or streaming device, so you can lean back and enjoy your favorite programming on your biggest screen.

This is the official app of WGRZ2 and WGRZ.com, the NBC affiliate serving the Buffalo and Western New York region.

Got feedback? Let us know how we can make this the best app experience for you! Send us a note at appfeedback@tegna.com.

apps.title: NBC LA: News, Weather, Live TV
apps.description:
The NBC Los Angeles news and weather app connects you with local news, weather forecasts and breaking headlines throughout LA and Southern California. It is your gateway to local news, weather updates, and a free NBC Los Angeles News 24/7 streaming channel. The app is free to download and easy to use, offering customizable breaking news alerts and weather notifications tailored to your location through convenient app settings.

The NBC Los Angeles app helps you stay informed with the following features:

LOS ANGELES NEWS ALERTS 
+ Alerts for LA local news, Southern California news, national headlines and world news that can be personalized and managed in the app settings
+ Top news of the day, covering breaking news, politics, weather, wildfires and earthquakes
+ Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order
+ Alerts center that shows you the most urgent LA stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications
+Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in LA local news and pop culture 

NBC LA FIRST ALERT WEATHER
+ Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange 
+ Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts 
+ Exclusive Live First Alert radar tracks storms in your neighborhood with our Live Doppler Network
+ Forecasts from our weather team alerting you to severe weather before it strikes
+ Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable graph 
+ Detailed forecast data that includes UV index, air quality and other live weather conditions 
+ Weather alerts for every location you see in the app
+ Complete weather closings for Los Angeles-area schools
+ Weather news videos from your local meteorologists 

NBC LOS ANGELES NEWS 24/7 STREAMING CHANNEL
+ Free 24/7 NBC Los Angeles News streaming channel
+ Live Channel 4 newscasts and streaming content
+ Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in the LA area
+ Live streams and live coverage of car chases
+ Dedicated video page with the latest video feed 

NBC4 INVESTIGATIONS & MORE
+ Exclusive NBC4 I-Team stories that get results
+ NBC4 Responds reports that solve your consumer problems
+ Sports news from NBC Sports Regional Sports Networks
+ Business news, finance news and stock market news from CNBC
+ Entertainment news from E! Online and Access 
+ Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY show


The NBC Los Angeles news and weather app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC_Southern_California/   
CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_Southern_California

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: TODAY Show
apps.description:
Download the new TODAY app for the best of America’s #1 morning show! All day. Anytime. Anywhere. 

* Catch up with your favorite TODAY hosts, including Savannah Guthrie, Hoda Kotb, Al Roker, Craig Melvin, Carson Daly, Willie Geist, and the rest of the TODAY team!
* Watch segments from NBC's TODAY, and the latest original videos and trending stories from TODAY.com
* Shop our latest Steals & Deals, trending gift ideas, editors’ favorites and recommended products in health, beauty, style, fashion, and more!
* Listen to the TODAY All Day TuneIn Stream on the move! Our 24/7 stream is now available in the app so you can bring TODAY with you, wherever you go!
* Search for TODAY content including articles, videos, slideshows and more as part of our new in app search feature!
* Find your favorite recipes, celebrity interviews, parenting tips, uplifting stories, healthy living, pop culture, and national news.

----
This app features Nielsen proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings.

To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
