apps.title: Local News -Breaking & Latest
apps.description:
Stay connected to what matters most in your community with Local News! Local News delivers the latest breaking weather forecasts, local and global events, and crucial headlines that affect your daily life.

As a comprehensive news platform, Local News provides timely information across a variety of topics, including local news, business, technology, entertainment, sports, politics, and more. With its user-friendly interface, navigating and accessing the latest stories is a breeze, ensuring you stay informed with carefully curated content from trusted sources around the world.

Local News Features:

• Local News Highlights
- Clear Daily Briefing: Get breaking local news, traffic updates, nearby events, weather alerts, and more in one convenient summary.
- Short News Videos: Enjoy a diverse range of engaging short videos covering local news, events, and community highlights.
- Latest Weather & Traffic Updates: Stay informed at a glance with breaking updates!
- Rich and Reliable News Sources
Access local news sources to keep you updated on authentic events. Get the latest stories with just one refresh!

• Personalized News Feed
- Highly Personalized: Receive stories tailored to your interests, including breaking local news.
- Wide Coverage: Stay informed about sports, tech, health, real estate, science, celebrity news, and more.
- Headline News & Events: Keep up with the latest coverage of national and local headlines, including breaking news alerts.

• Concise Interface Design
- Our interface ensures a seamless experience as you dive into the latest breaking news and trending topics.
- Check your history and bookmarks to revisit news that matters to you, including local updates.
- You can adjust the font size for a more personalized reading experience, ensuring everything is comfortable and accessible. 

• Push Notifications In Time
- Never miss an important story with real-time, tailored notifications on breaking local news, community happenings, and significant international headlines.

• Real-time Weather Conditions
- Stay informed with live weather updates and plan your activities confidently. Access 24-hour and 7-day forecasts to stay ahead of changing conditions.

• Listen to the News
- Listen to the news on the go just like a podcast! Our audio feature allows you to stay informed while multitasking, making it easy to catch up on the latest stories without reading.

Disclaimer:
- Local News is an RSS feed aggregator and is not affiliated with any news media site.
- Our goal is to enhance the accessibility of news content and facilitate information dissemination. News content does not represent the position of our app.
- Users are solely responsible for any unauthorized actions and violations of intellectual property rights (e.g., sharing/commenting on news).
For feedback or suggestions, contact us at newsdeliverhelp@gmail.com.

Subscription pricing and terms:

Local News offers an auto-renewing monthly subscription at $3.99/month and an auto-renewing yearly subscription at $39.99/year to provide you with unlimited access to the episodes while you maintain an active subscription. 

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://novanewsapp.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Service: https://novanewsapp.com/terms-service.html

Stay informed, stay connected!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: 7 News HD - Boston News Source
apps.description:
7News WHDH-TV is Boston's News Station and with this app all our resources are at your fingertips. You can live stream all our newscasts along with breaking news and weather coverage and watch other important events as they unfold. You'll get up-to-the-minute developments on the stories you care about, your weather forecast, warnings about traffic or safety issues in your area, coverage of our local sports teams and the stories everyone is talking about. You can receive push notifications for breaking news, live video streams, and weather alerts that matter to you. 

FEATURES :
VIDEO : Live stream 7News newscasts and breaking news, watch the latest forecast from the 7Weather team, and play hundreds of news videos. 
SHARE : Send in your videos and photos with our Send it to 7 feature and see some of them on air. You can also tip us off to a story you think we should be covering. 
WEATHER : Track storms live with our interactive radar and view a list of the latest closings and delays. Check out current weather conditions, your 7-Day forecast, special weather maps, and blogs from Pete Bouchard, Jeremy Reiner, Chris Lambert and Bri Eggers.

Download our 7News app today so you can get caught up whenever you want, wherever you are.

apps.title: Cafeyn - News & magazines
apps.description:
The world’s newspapers and magazines at your fingertips 

Cafeyn gives you unlimited access to all of your favourite newspapers and magazines.  You can read as digital page turners or by article with optimised smartphone reading.  Catch-up on the latest news or simply take time out to read your favourite magazine – celebrity news, health, sport, lifestyle, automotive, tech, movies or home décor – Cafeyn’s wide choice of titles will keep you entertained at home of on the go with online and offline reading.

Digital reading reinvented: personalise your experience, by choosing your favourite topics or titles to follow and build your own mobile library that you can access at anytime, anywhere.

Why you will love Cafeyn:-

Thousand of newspaper and magazines in one subscription.
Choose from the most famous and trusted titles and brands, updated daily.
Real time news with your own newsfeed, updated 24/7.
Curate your own library of your favourite titles for your own personalised experience.
Optimised for smartphone reading on the go with online and offline modes.
Suggested content and recommendations take you beyond the headlines.

Top titles include:

News: The Guardian, The Independent, The i-newspaper, The Week, The Observer, Daily Mirror

Lifestyle: Elle UK, Woman, Country Life, Cosmopolitan UK, Esquire UK, Prima, Red

People and TV: Hello!, Radio Times, OK! TV Times, Inside Soap

Health & Fitness: Men’s Health UK, Women’s Fitness, Women’s Health, Psychologies UK, Runner’s World, Cycling Plus

Sport: FourFourTwo, Cycling Weekly, Golf Monthly, Boxing News, Match of the Day Magazine

Hobbies: Amateur Photographer, History of War, Photography Weekly, All About History, Inside Crochet, Total Guitar, Amateur Gardening, Retro Gamer, The Great Outdoors

Design: Elle Decoration UK, Wallpaper, Country Homes & Interiors, 25 Beautiful Homes, Ideal Home, Homes & Gardens, Living Etc…

Food: Good Food Magazine, Olive, Easy Cook Magazine, Decanter, The Observer Food Monthly, Kitchen Garden, Feast

Automotive: Auto Express, Autocar, What Car? Motorcycle Sport & Leisure, Evo, Classic & Sports Car

International: Time, Newsweek, Sports Illustrated, Vogue France, Le Parisien, Le Figaro

The Cafeyn subscription is monthly and starts upon registration. You can easily cancel online 24/7. No commitment or cancellation fees.
 
For help with Cafeyn, please visit: https://support.cafeyn.co/hc/en-gb
 
To view our Subscription Terms and other conditions, visit: https://www.cafeyn.co/uk/terms-and-conditions
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.cafeyn.co/uk/privacy-policy
 
Cookie Policy: https://www.cafeyn.co/uk/cookiespolicy

apps.description:
Looking for an app that gives you real-time scores, custom alerts, and expert sports coverage — all in one place?
Yahoo Sports is the answer for fans who want fast updates, reliable stats, and curated news on every major league.

• Real-Time Game Coverage
	•	Live scores and stats from the NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAA, WNBA, soccer, and more
	•	Game-day play-by-play, win probabilities, and in-game updates
	•	Easy access to schedules, standings, and box scores
	•	Video highlights and post-game recaps across leagues
	•	New Key Plays feed highlighting every TD, turnover, and big play in every game, every week.

• Personalized Alerts for Every Fan
	•	Want to follow just your teams? Set up custom notifications for game starts, score changes, and big moments.
	•	Live Activities for your favorite teams and every big event. Now including Key Plays so you can follow every TD and turnover in the NFL from your lock screen with the Key Plays Live Activity.
	•	Choose alert frequency: breaking news or daily digests of your favorite teams.
	•	Sync with your Yahoo account to follow only what matters to you.

• Exclusive Shows & Commentary
	•	The Ariel Helwani Show for boxing & MMA breakdowns
	•	The Kevin O’Connor Show for NBA insights
	•	Weekly fantasy tips, betting talk, and storylines from real insiders
	•	Original shows and roundtables you won’t find elsewhere

• Your Team, All in One Place
	•	New Team pages make it easy to catch up on everything that matters—top highlights, key storylines, news coverage, game results, rosters, and team stats with recent historical seasons too!

• Discover More Highlights
	•	We've got a new video player experience that makes it easier than ever to find and watch every highlight you care about.
	•	Watch what’s up next and recommended, or jump over to a playlist that catches your eye.

• Join the Best Community in Sports
	•	Hang out with other diehards chatting about all things sports.
	•	Weekly NFL megathreads and focused game discussions across every sport give you plenty of places to go deep on every last one of those start/sit decisions you’re agonizing over.

• All the Sports You Follow
	•	If you’re searching for live NFL scores, NBA playoff updates, or college basketball rankings — this app delivers:
	•	NFL and NCAA Football
	•	NBA, WNBA, NCAA Basketball
	•	MLB, NHL, PGA, Tennis, F1, NASCAR, MMA, Boxing, Wrestling and more
	•	MLS, Premier League, Bundesliga, La Liga, Champions League, World Cup, and more

• Play Daily Draw
	•	Daily Draw is a game that is only available in the Yahoo Sports App.
	•	Get a pack of six cards, play four cards based on what you think will happen in the game of the day.
	•	If the cards hat you picked happen in the game, you get points. Most points win!
	•	Play Daily Draw every day and set your mark on the top of the leaderboard.

Download Yahoo Sports to get custom alerts, breaking news, and real-time scores — the way fans want them.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
We're ready for football season! We've made some major updates to the app to help you follow every moment of every game, all season long.

• Never Miss a Key Moment: Introducing Key Plays, a new feed highlighting every TD, every turnover, and every big play – every week around the NFL. You can react to and talk about every moment with the Yahoo Sports community. You can also bring the experience to your lock screen, following every TD and turnover with the Key Plays Live Activity.

• Your Team, All in One Place: Every game, storyline, rumor, and highlight we’ve got about your favorite teams is right on the Home screen when you open the app. New Team pages make it easy to catch up on everything that matters - top highlights, key storylines, news coverage from local sources, game results, rosters, team stats (with recent historical seasons, too).

• Discover More Highlights: We've got a new video player experience that makes it easier than ever to find and watch every highlight you care about. Watch what’s up next and recommended, or jump over to a playlist that catches your eye.

• Join the Best Community in Sports: Hang out with other diehards chatting about all things football. Weekly megathreads and focused game discussions give you plenty of places to go deep on every last one of those start/sit decisions you’re agonizing over.

apps.title: 14 NEWS WFIE
apps.description:
Download the power of the WFIE 14 NEWS application right to your iPhone!
14 NEWS delivers local news coverage for Evansville and the entire Tri State area including Indiana, Kentucky, and Illinois. Features include:

Breaking news alerts

Live, local news stories

TriState Headlines

Sports

Video

And so much more!

This app requests location to help customize content for you. We will provide location information and information about your use of the app to our advertising partners in order to customize the ads displayed in this app and other apps you use. Please review our privacy policy for more details and for your choices.

apps.title: Tyler News from CBS19
apps.description:
Stay up-to-date with the latest news and weather in the Tyler area on the all-new free KYTX app from CBS 19. 

Our app features the latest breaking news that impacts you and your family, interactive weather and radar, and live video from our newscasts and local events.

LOCAL & BREAKING NEWS
• Receive real-time notifications for breaking news
• Read the latest news as it happens in your area
• Explore exclusive investigative stories
• Browse photos, news clips, and raw video

LOCAL WEATHER
• Daily and hourly forecasts for your city
• The latest forecasts from our meteorologists
• Interactive radar maps
• Automated hyperlocal severe weather alerts

LIVE VIDEO
• Watch live video newscasts and breaking news from KYTX

PERSONALIZATION
• Discover and dive into topics that matter to you
• Favorite topics to receive personalized updates

Other Features:
• Share stories & videos directly with your friends and family
• See the latest updates and behind the scenes photos from your favorite anchors and reporters
• Get information on school delays & closings as they happen
• Cast videos and livestreams directly to your TV or streaming device, so you can lean back and enjoy your favorite programming on your biggest screen.

This is the official app of KYTX and cbs19.tv, the CBS affiliate serving the Tyler, TX area.

Got feedback? Let us know how we can make this the best app experience for you! Send us a note at appfeedback@tegna.com.

Privacy Policy: https://www.cbs19.tv/privacy
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.cbs19.tv/do-not-sell-my-information
Terms of Service: https://www.cbs19.tv/terms

apps.title: ABC7 Chicago News & Weather
apps.description:
Watch ABC7 Eyewitness News and get breaking news alerts with the ABC7 Chicago app. Stay updated with the latest local and national news plus the AccuWeather forecast, Get more live video than ever before with the 24/7 live stream. 

WATCH
- Watch Eyewitness News Live on the 24/7 streaming channel
- Looking for videos that aired in a newscast or entire newscasts you might have missed? Find those under the "videos" tab
- Use the “picture in picture” feature to watch live video while you use other apps on your phone

EXPLORE
- Find a news story by entering a keyword into the search bar
- Browse news by topic, including I-Team, Safety Tracker, Politics and more! 

WEATHER
- Easily choose your locations to get hourly conditions and 7-day forecast
- Get real-time Doppler maps along with detailed weather information
- Get weather and traffic alerts for severe conditions so you’re always up-to-date before you go

MY NEWS
- Stay informed on stories that matter to you by choosing topics you care about
- “My News” builds a unique feed just for you based on interests and locations you choose
- Choose customized alerts for topics and locations you care about, from entertainment news to sports updates and everything  in between
 
Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Information - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi

Before you download this app, please consider that it includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within mobile applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device's advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).

raw_data.releaseNotes: This release includes various bug fixes and improvements to continue providing a best-in-class news experience.

apps.title: AL.com
apps.description:
AL.com reports on the stories and events that have a direct impact on your world. Stay connected with the most important local news you need from a name you know and trust. Timely and reliable reporting, always available whenever and wherever you are.

Our reporters, editors and photographers live and work in the very same communities as you and know firsthand just how important it is to be informed and aware of the world that’s unfolding right in your own backyard. Whether your interests are the latest in news, sports, politics, business, culture, and so much more, we’ve always got you covered.

Our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
http://www.advance.net/advancedigitalUserAgreementPP/

apps.title: Columbus Dispatch: Local News
apps.description:
The Columbus Dispatch is your top source for breaking news in Columbus and Ohio. Stay informed with our in-depth coverage, timely updates, and comprehensive reporting on the stories that matter most to you. From local events to statewide issues, we are committed to delivering the news that impacts your community. 
We’re here because we believe that local journalism is valuable – from simple things like weather reports that let you know you’ll need a jacket today to in-depth investigations and the latest news right on the app.  
  
We’re our community’s trusted storytellers. We’re here for it.  
   
WHAT WE’RE ALL ABOUT:  
• Impactful insider coverage of Ohio politics that keeps your state, county and city governments in check.  
• Journalism that makes our neighborhoods better by celebrating the good, solving the bad, and investigating the ugly.  
• Unparalleled coverage on the latest news on growth and development in central Ohio, including Ohio's Intel Project.  
• Sports coverage for locals, by locals, analyzing the Blue Jackets, the Crew, Ohio State University, and high school sports programs.  
• Sports analysis from our reporters in the newsroom delivered via text message.  
• App features like real-time alerts, challenging puzzles and lively podcasts, a personalized feed, the eNewspaper, and more.  
   
APP FEATURES:  
• Real-time breaking news alerts   
• A personalized feed on the all-new For You page   
• Lively podcasts with hosts who are connected to the pulse of our city  
• The eNewspaper, a digital replica of our print newspaper  
  
Subscription Information: 
• The Columbus Dispatch app is free to download, and all users can access a sampling of free articles every month.  
• Subscriptions are charged to your account at confirmation of purchase and automatically renew each month or year, unless turned off in your account settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. See "Subscription Support" in the app's Settings for more details and customer service contact information.   
  
MORE INFORMATION: 
• Privacy Policy: https://cm.dispatch.com/privacy/ 
• Terms of Service: https://cm.dispatch.com/terms/ 
• Questions or Comments: mobilesupport@gannett.com

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes: • Bug fixes: We've made some changes under the hood for a better user experience.

apps.title: MixerBox Breaking News Alerts
apps.description:
Get all the latest headlines from breaking, trending, local, sports, entertainment, business, politics, lifestyle and more! Unlimited news from your favorite publishers all in one app!
Let MixerBox AI chatbot handle the summarization and reading international news and local updates!

Features:

・AI Smart Summaries: Equipped with OpenAI ChatGPT!Leading news and magazine app, making it easy to stay informed on complete topics and events ahead of other media outlets.
・Immediate Updates: Get alerts ahead of anyone else for top breaking news & headlines; local, national, weather, and global.
・Personalized Reading: Customize your feed the way you want. Reorder tabs to see what matters to you the most first & follow news & magazine sources to get all the latest updates.
・Full Perspectives: MB News aggregates news and magazines from multiple sources, providing you with opinions, inside scoops, & stories from every perspective. News you can trust.
・Subscription-free: Start reading right away. Easy as that.
・Optimized Reading Experience: Easily switch between light & true dark mode for every news page. Change text size to tailor reading to your needs.
・Space for discussion: Exchange thoughts & opinions and broaden your views by leaving comments under news or magazine articles and engaging with the community!

News Categories

・Trending - top stories & daily news headlines
・Local News - local & community news, crime news, weather updates, and sports results
・US - all U.S. news covering politics, economics, crime, entertainment (movies, tv series, e news), lifestyle, technology, business and more.
・World - latest world news and international current events from Asia, Europe, South America, the Middle East, Australia, South East Asia & Africa!
・Health - The most relevant health news: explore articles on fitness, diet, emerging research, nutrition, parenting, relationships, medicine, mental health, and healthy living.
・Politics - All breaking news on U.S. politics, including the latest coverage of the White House, Congress, the Supreme Court, Voting Dates updates on local laws & regulation, taxes & more.
・Sports - schedules, scores, stats, in-depth analysis, player & league news, standings, injury reports and many more, read all the news of your favorite sport (NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, college sports, high school sports, etc.)
・And more! From lifestyle, personal finance, to Hollywood celebrity, influencer, movie & TV entertainment (e news) you name it! Download MB Breaking News app now to discover more!

Get MixerBox News app now to stay up to date with the best news stories & magazine publications!

For any questions or feedback, please contact us at: mbsupport.news@mixerbox.com. Thank you!

———————————————————
*This app has been registered and authorized by the company MixerBox Inc.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Our AI News Summarize Feature is here! Let AI news summaries accurately organize daily headlines for you!

We are working hard to provide greater access to personalized breaking news and magazine stories to everyone around the world.
If you have any feedback on how we can improve, please email us at mbsupport.news@mixerbox.com. Thank you!

apps.title: fresh－Local News & Breaking US
apps.description:
fresh is a modern news app that makes it easy to access your favorite news coverage anytime and anywhere. Whether you're looking for local breaking news during your morning brew or just daily news in your RSS feed, it's easy as ABC. 

Want specifics such as what the economist is saying about your country or trending politics worldwide? fresh has you covered with the latest finance news and world news. You choose and fresh delivers everything from the Washington Post, New York Yimes, Newsmax to CBS news and many more!
 
But that's not all. With fresh, you get more stuff than what other news apps offer. Screen for trusted sources such as NBC news, Reuters, the Associated Press, to get only unbiased news about the latest events, tech news or viral videos. 

The top reasons people love fresh news aggregator include:
- Easy menu configuration to get just the news you want.
- Bundle preferences in one app with just a few clicks.
- Light and powerful. You won't have to worry about extra memory.
- Easy installation possible without your private data.
- Access a wide range of trusted sources from the Guardian, Breitbart news, Bloomberg, Newsnation etc. to regular street news. We've compiled different sources, so you never get bored.
- Access to the most popular social media networks so that you can share what matters the most to you. 
Getting started to access the main news can be done in three easy steps:
- Download fresh app on your phone and provide the necessary permissions 
- Customize your news aggregator according to your main news preferences 
- Enjoy the latest news anytime and on your terms!

Why people love fresh?
- Simple to use for even the most complex topics. Just categorize your preferences to filter topics that matter the most to you. You can create as many preference lists as you wish. There're no limits!
- No need to burden your mobile with numerous downloads. fresh is your one-stop-news-app. Your RSS reader will deliver the newest updates in your news feed with local news, business news, sport news, or smart news.
- Get news on the go or sent daily. Mail your friends to share what you've found.
- See something interesting, but don't have time to read it? Bookmark is easy for people on the go. You can bookmark written content or videos with just a few clicks. 

With various sources to choose from, your news feed will be alive with topics that matter to you. You'll be in full control of the content you see and can opt-in and out anytime according to your changing preferences. This way you only get fresh, good news that adds value to your day.

Once you have the news app, you don't have to worry about ever missing. The news application comes compact with a wide range of sources to give you a unique news experience in just a few clicks. Take a break and find out what happens in the world or in your home town!

As a standalone news app, we have gone above and beyond to deliver a high-quality product. Found something in the app or an experience you'd like to share? Reach out and share your ratings so that others can also have a unique news experience.

Terms of use: https://myfresh.app/rules.html

apps.title: Talking Tom & Ben News
apps.description:
Breaking news - Talking Tom and Talking Ben are even chattier and more entertaining as TV news anchors!

Join them in their TV studio, talk to them and watch them take it in turns to repeat what you say. Poke or swipe the screen and have them fall off their chairs!

You can express your creativity by creating the news or just enjoy watching the two tease each other. Either way, you'll have a bundle of fun!

Check out all hilarious animations by getting the full app now!

Features:
- Talk to Tom and Ben: See them take turns to repeat what you say.
- Watch them interact with one another: They tease each other in a hilarious way!
- Co-create the news: Upload your own video or photo and see what happens.
- Send videos to your friends: Record your own news story and share it by email!

IMPORTANT - To remove all ads within the app you will need to make an in-app purchase.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases

Please note, we do not process all the data disclosed on the label for users under the age of digital consent. For more information, please check our Privacy Policy.
Terms of use: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/eula/en/
Privacy policy for games: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/privacy-policy-games/en
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

apps.title: NBC Connecticut News & Weather
apps.description:
The NBC Connecticut news and weather app connects you with the best local stories, accurate weather forecasts, investigative journalism and a free, 24/7 streaming news channel. Free to download and to use, the app delivers Connecticut breaking news alerts and weather alerts for your location that can be customized and easily managed in the app settings. 

The app gives you access to Connecticut local news from the award-winning NBC Connecticut news team, who covers the issues and concerns most important CT residents. Get access to a powerful weather radar, local traffic updates, live updates on developing stories in CT and beyond, sports, entertainment news, lifestyle, business news and financial insights in one app. 

The NBC Connecticut local app helps you stayed informed with the following features:

NBC CONNECTICUT WEATHER -- THE STATE'S MOST ACCURATE FORECAST CERTIFIED BY WEATHERATE+
+ Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange 
+ Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts 
+ Live weather radar with exclusive features and data - the app allows you to expand the radar to full screen and navigate between past and future
+ 10-day forecasts for your CT region 
+ Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable graph
+ Connecticut local weather maps and radar  
+ Connecticut local weather forecast data that includes UV index, air quality and other live weather conditions 
+ Weather alerts for every location you save in the app
+ Weather closings for Connecticut schools
+ Weather news videos from your NBC CT meteorologists 

CONNECTICUT NEWS ALERTS 
+ Alerts for Connecticut local news, national headlines and world news that can be personalized and managed in the app settings
+Top News of the day, covering breaking news, politics, urgent product recalls and good news
+ Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order
+ Alerts center that shows you the most urgent CT stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications
+Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in local news and pop culture 

NBC CONNECTICUT NEWS 24/7 STREAMING CHANNEL
+ Free 24/7 NBC Connecticut News streaming channel
+ Live NBC Connecticut local newscasts 
+ Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in Connecticut
+ Dedicated video page with the latest video feed 

NBC CONNECTICUT I-TEAM INVESTIGATIONS & MORE
+ Investigative stories from Troubleshooters, an award-winning local investigative team that gets results
+ Consumer reports from NBC Connecticut Responds team that protects and advocates for you
+ Sports news from NBC Sports Regional Sports Networks
+ Business news, finance news and stock market news from CNBC
+ Entertainment and celebrity news from E! Online and Access 
+ Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY show

NBC Connecticut's core mission is to protect, empower, and inform viewers about what is happening throughout the state and within their communities. Working with Telemundo Nueva Inglaterra allows our content to be amplified and delivered to our Spanish-speaking audience throughout the state. 
NBC Universal owns NBC Connecticut as part of the NBCUniversal Local Owned Stations Group. NBC Connecticut first aired on Feb. 13, 1953, and is the state's second-oldest television station. 

The NBC Connecticut news and weather app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC_Connecticut/ 
CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_Connecticut

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
- You can now create a free account in the app. By signing in with your NBCUniversal Profile, you’ll be able to save articles and videos to view later, and manage your newsletter subscriptions across NBCUniversal platforms.
- This update also includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Please rate our app in the App Store and send your feedback to WVITdigitalfeedback@nbcuni.com.

apps.title: Newsdaily - Headlines & News
apps.description:
Read your daily news more smoothly and conveniently.

Newsdaily, a powerful & sophisticated news reader, automatically presents each news page in a clean and readable manner with its built-in optimizer engine. Articles are displayed extremely quickly and text size, font, and themes are completely customizable for easy reading.

Sources are Google News RSS feeds, so you can get the latest news from thousands of publishers in one place, from more than 70 countries/regions in 27 languages. Any story can be found by entering keywords.

Newsdaily clipping functions gives you the ability to store interesting articles on your device. You can classify clippings by folder to read later.



Key features:
- No setup is required. Once you start up Newsdaily, you receive the latest news.
- The Newsdaily optimizer quickly displays clean and readable pages. All ads or unnecessary links are drastically reduced.
- It’s also possible to easily switch between the usual display and the optimized display.
- Search for news stories with keywords.
- Save articles to your device.
- Add custom news categories that you frequently check.
- Dropdown menus from by long-pressing will gives easy access to related news and allows for easy article sharing.
- Darker Themes available for night reading 
- Universal: Available for the iPhone and the iPad!
- Customizable gestures, full screen for iPad mini, multi-functional image viewer, history, star articles, are among the specific features for Apple mobile products.
- Keyword-based source filtering.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fix.

apps.title: Denver News from 9News
apps.description:
Stay up-to-date with the latest news and weather in Denver on the all-new 9NEWS app from KUSA.

Our app features the latest breaking news that impacts you and your family, interactive weather and radar, and live video from our newscasts and local events.

LOCAL & BREAKING NEWS
• Receive real-time notifications for breaking news
• Read the latest news as it happens in your area
• Explore exclusive investigative stories
• Browse photos, news clips, and raw video

LOCAL WEATHER
• Daily and hourly forecasts for your city
• The latest forecasts from our meteorologists
• Interactive radar maps
• Automated hyperlocal severe weather alerts

LIVE VIDEO
• Watch live video newscasts and breaking news from 9NEWS

PERSONALIZATION
• Discover and dive into topics that matter to you
• Favorite topics to receive personalized updates

Other Features:
• Share stories & videos directly with your friends and family
• See the latest updates and behind the scenes photos from your favorite anchors and reporters
• Get information on school delays & closings as they happen
• Cast videos and livestreams directly to your TV or streaming device, so you can lean back and enjoy your favorite programming on your biggest screen.

This is the official app of KUSA and 9NEWS.com, the NBC affiliate serving the Denver, Colorado area. 

Got feedback? Let us know how we can make this the best app experience for you! Send us a note at appfeedback@tegna.com.

Privacy Policy: https://www.9news.com/privacy
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.9news.com/do-not-sell-my-information
Terms of Service: https://www.9news.com/terms

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug Fixes and Improvements.

apps.title: ABC7 Bay Area
apps.description:
Stream live newscasts with the ABC7 Bay Area app.  Stay up-to-date on local news and weather, along with national top stories.  Plus, customize the app based on your interests. 

WATCH
- All of ABC7's live streams are available in one place
- Looking for videos that aired in a newscast or entire newscasts you might have missed? Find those under the "videos" tab
- Use the “picture in picture” feature to watch live video while you use other apps on your phone

EXPLORE
- Want good news?  Or stories where you live? Search for your stories of interest using the explore section
- Browse content in our featured sections like Building a Better Bay Area, I-Team Investigations, Allies in Action, and more!

WEATHER
- Easily choose your locations to get hourly conditions and 7-day forecasts where you live
- See real-time LiveDoppler7 maps along with detailed weather information
- Get weather and traffic alerts to prepare you for severe conditions

MY NEWS
- Stay informed on stories that matter to you by choosing topics you care about
- The My News section builds a unique feed just for you based on interests and the locations you choose
- Choose customized alerts for topics and locations you care about.... breaking news, weather and traffic alerts, sports, and all things Bay Area!
 
Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Information - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi
 
Before you download this app, please consider that it includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within mobile applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device's advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).

raw_data.releaseNotes: This release includes various bug fixes and improvements to continue providing a best-in-class news experience.

apps.title: Queen City News - Charlotte
apps.description:
News has never been more local than in the palm of your hand. The Queen City News mobile app brings you all the top stories from Carolinas' Own Queen City News in Charlotte's daily broadcasts, as well as stories developing in real-time.



Queen City News, is North Carolina's largest local news provider, known and trusted for breaking news, weather, sports, and streaming video. The FOX-affiliated television station serves a significant area of the Carolinas including Charlotte, the Piedmont, Foothills, Sandhills, western mountain counties of North Carolina, and portions of Upstate South Carolina.


QC News’ content is available 24/7: mobile, social media networks, and email alerts.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've fixed some bugs and improved general performance.

apps.title: Tennessean: News & eNewspaper
apps.description:
We are Nashville’s leading source of local news because we know this: If it’s important to you, it’s important to us. Music, jobs, transportation, government, economic news, education, the Predators and the Titans, plus expert opinions on all your favorite subjects.  

We’re our community’s trusted storytellers. We’re here for it.  

   WHAT WE’RE ALL ABOUT:  
• Impactful insider coverage of Nashville politics that keeps the government in check.   
• Journalism that makes our home better by celebrating the good, solving the bad, and investigating the ugly.  
• Music city coverage and what it means for Nashvillians (transplants and unicorns alike).  
• Award-winning sports coverage that makes sense of every move and the strategy behind them and always puts the wins and losses in context.  
• Expert guides to our dining scene, plus reviews of the Top 25 restaurants in Nashville.   
• App features like real-time alerts, challenging puzzles and lively podcasts, a personalized feed, the eNewspaper, and more.  
   
APP FEATURES:  
• Real-time breaking news alerts   
• A personalized feed on the all-new For You page   
• The eNewspaper, a digital replica of our print newspaper  
  
Subscription Information: 
• The Tennessean app is free to download, and all users can access a sampling of free articles every month.  
• Subscriptions are charged to your account at confirmation of purchase and automatically renew each month or year, unless turned off in your account settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. See "Subscription Support" in the app's Settings for more details and customer service contact information.   
  
MORE INFORMATION: 
• Privacy Policy: https://cm.tennessean.com/privacy/ 
• Terms of Service: https://cm.tennessean.com/terms/ 
• Questions or Comments: mobilesupport@gannett.com

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes: • Bug fixes: We've made some changes under the hood for a better user experience.

• Real-time breaking news alerts   
• A personalized feed on the all-new For You page   
• The eNewspaper, a digital replica of our print newspaper  
  
Subscription Information: 
• The Tennessean app is free to download, and all users can access a sampling of free articles every month.  
• Subscriptions are charged to your account at confirmation of purchase and automatically renew each month or year, unless turned off in your account settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. See "Subscription Support" in the app's Settings for more details and customer service contact information.   
  
MORE INFORMATION: 
• Privacy Policy: https://cm.tennessean.com/privacy/ 
• Terms of Service: https://cm.tennessean.com/terms/ 
• Questions or Comments: mobilesupport@gannett.com

apps.title: Naples Daily News
apps.description:
From critically acclaimed storytelling to powerful photography to engaging videos — the Naples Daily News app delivers the local news that matters most to your community.

• Access all of our in-depth journalism, including things to do around town, sports coverage from high school to the pros, and much more.
• Enjoy a streamlined, fast-loading experience that makes it easy to view the stories, photos, and videos that matter to you.
• Get breaking news, sports scores, and weather alerts with real-time notifications tailored to your interests.
• Customize your experience by saving your favorite stories, adjusting text size, using night mode, or reading offline.

apps.title: WLKY News - Louisville
apps.description:
Take the WLKY News app with you everywhere you go and be the first to know of breaking news happening in Louisville and the surrounding area. Always stay up to date with the latest local news, national, sports, traffic, political, entertainment stories and much more. Download the WLKY News app for free today.

Our Local News, Weather and Sports App Features Include:
- Louisville breaking news alerts with push notifications
- Live streaming breaking news updates from our WLKY News reporters when it happens, where it happens
- Local news submission area for breaking news, news tips and the ability to email your news photos and videos right to our newsroom to be featured on air
- Up to date, current local weather conditions, hourly Louisville weather updates, and 7 day forecasts
- Share stories via email or your social media pages
- An interactive radar that lets you zoom in and out to street level and watch storms as they approach. Move the map around to see major weather activity
- Louisville weather alerts and updates, WLKY weather videocasts and more

Although Hearst Television believes the majority of its news content is appropriate for a variety of ages, it is intended for individuals 18 and older.

apps.title: Patch - Everything Local
apps.description:
If you're looking for "everything local," Patch is the app for you. Local schools? Check. Breaking news? Check. Homes for sale? We've got those, too. You'll always be in touch with your town with the Patch app.

Check out these features:
•  News and events for 1,200+ Patch Towns, with more towns added every month.
•  Push notifications as important news breaks — you’ll be the first to get the scoop.
•  Swipe left or right to view articles faster.
•  Local weather forecasts and alerts — you'll never be caught without an umbrella or snow boots again.
•  Find local events, jobs and announcements in your area. 
•  Get everything that is happening in your town in a one-scroll feed!
•  Share stories to your Facebook friends or email/SMS to a friend!
•  Patch also has fun iMessage animal stickers to share your emotions with your friends!
•  Love an article? You can bookmark it to your phone to come back and read it later.
•  Want to follow multiple towns? No problem, swipe left or right to navigate between your favorite Patch towns. 

Our new Patch app delivers a beautiful browsing and reading experience for iOS users. Our pages load lightning fast. You'll never be kept waiting to see what's behind that headline. The sleek design provides an in-depth storytelling experience fueled by concise writing and rich imagery.

TELL US WHAT YOU THINK:
We're eager to hear your feedback and suggestions. How can we make the app even better? What features would you like to see? We aim to be the best news app in the country, and your ideas are crucial. Please email us at Feedback@patch.com

Images used under license from Shutterstock.com

apps.title: Breaking Local News: FlashNews
apps.description:
FlashNews is an online news platform to keep you updated with the latest news all over the world. Keep up to date with the latest local news headlines, breaking news and trending news feeds for free.

Follow current events in your neighbourhood , get weather alerts in your locality, or check for global trends in science, technology or economics. Stay on top of all topics with 100% accurate and relevant news personalised for your taste.

Get daily local news alerts on your phone from world renowned news sources including - New York Times, The Guardian, CNN, BBC,Washington Times, Wall Street Journal, NBC News, The Reuters, Washington Post shared by top journalists from all over the U.S and the world.

Read the news that matters to you including sports news, celebrity news, criminal news, business news,local news, tech news, health news, real estate news, science news, finance news, stock market news and many more.

FlashNews features and offerings - 

Local news tailored for You : 
Get local news about your city / county including local weather news, local breaking news, local crime news, local traffic updates, etc
Get local sports news for your favourite sports team and leagues.
Stay informed about your neighbourhood with local news from Texas, California and other US States.
Stay updated about state news including but not limited to Texas News, NY news and California News.
Find local restaurants, deals, shop openings and more ahead of time from one news app.

Personalized News feed : 
Discover the news that matters to you for free.
Get daily news briefing personalised and specially curated for your liking.
Access trending news including National News, International News and Global news.
Our expert news aggregators collect news from all around the globe, recommended to you by state of the art Artificial Intelligence.

Read News across categories :
FlashNews offers 20+ news categories including : local weather news, local breaking news, local crime news, local traffic updates, etc.
Find news from 1000+ trusted sources across the World including New York Times, The Guardian, CNN, BBC,Washington Times, Wall Street Journal, NBC News, The Reuters, Washington Post,The Texas Tribune,Texas Observer Magazine,etc for free.
Get access to Global News from top national and international newspapers, journalists and local news sources.

Stay Informed with Breaking News:
Get daily alerts covering headlines from US news.
Custom notifications to make sure you never miss out on the breaking news covering topics of National and International Importance.

News from 1000+ Trusted Sources
Access trending news liked and shared by thousands of readers.
FlashNews works directly with high-profile media publishers to present to you our featured channels.

Read latest local news from the following Categories -
Latest Crime News - Updates about criminal offence in and around your locality and globally
Trending Entertainment News - Trending news covering Hollywood News, Celebrity News and other entertainment shows.
Sports News - Stay updated with your favourite sports team covering major leagues including MLS, MLB ,NBA, NFL, MLS, etc
Political News - Stay up to date with the latest political developments in your city/county/state
Stock Market News - Get the latest Stock Market News first. In detailed Stock Analysis provided by the world's most trusted and renowned fund managers.
Tech News - Inspiring ideas and entrepreneurship stories from TechCrunch. Hacking news and gadgets from Engadget and trending software news from cnet, wired and gizmodo
Latest Science and Economics news - Read about the latest research news in the field of Science and Economics from sources such as The Economist, Forbes, The Wire, etc.
Food & Recipes -  Hand-picked high quality content from Pinterest, Allrecipes, Buzzfeed, New York Times(NYT) Cooking and allrecipes.


Download FlashNews today to be informed of the latest local news, headline news, US news and World news!

apps.title: Particle News
apps.description:
Understand more, faster. Particle removes the work of keeping up with what's happening by bringing everything you need to know into one place. 

PERSONALIZED NEWS
Keep up with the topics that matter most to you.

FOLLOW ANYTHING
Follow people, places, and things to always get news about them right in your feed. Follow journalists and publishers to always see content from them, too. Want it even faster? When something you follow is making news, you can choose to get notified right away.

SUMMARIZED, YOUR WAY
Read the news in succinct, summarized bullet points that tell you what you need to know. Choose from different summary styles, like "Explain Like I'm 5", "The 5Ws", or even a different language—to help you understand the story in the best way for you. Summaries let you quickly decide if you want to know more, and then you can dive deeper by tapping on the source articles, relevant links, and more. 

MULTI-PERSPECTIVE
Particle brings you news from many sources and provides multiple perspectives into one place. See the different sides of a story with the "Opposite Sides" summary style, and understand how a story is being covered with Particle's political spectrum chart.

INTERACTIVE
Need to learn more? Ask a question about any story, and Particle will answer it for you. Browse questions to learn from what others have asked.

LISTEN TO THE NEWS
Hit "Play" to listen to your personalized feed of news—perfect for your commute or being hands-free!

DAILY DIGESTS
Get push notifications for your top news every day.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Translate questions and answers on stories.
• Disable spoiler warnings across the app from Settings.
• Descriptions for groups of stories load quickly again.
• Addressed a few instances of high CPU usage.

apps.title: WFTV Eyewitness News
apps.description:
WFTV Channel 9 is serving Central Florida coverage you can count on as it happens with our 24/7 news app. Dig deeper on the major news of the day with our live and on-demand videos to keep you plugged in to what’s happening now. 

WFTV Channel 9 is your guide to: 


Minute-by-minute weather using WFTV Channel 9’s StormTracker Doppler Radar and 5-day Forecast so you know how the weather will impact you. 
Getting where you need to go on time with live drive times in and out of the Orlando Metro Area.
Direct sports coverage of the Orlando Magic, Orlando Predators, Orlando Solar Bears, Orlando City Soccer, Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Tampa Bay Lightning, Tampa Bay Rays, Jacksonville Jaguars, Miami Dolphins, Miami Marlins, Miami Heat, Florida Panthers, the PGA Tour, NASCAR and more.
Local news that matters for Brevard, Flagler, Lake, Marion, Orange, Osceola, Polk, Seminole, Sumter and Volusia counties including Orlando, DeLand, Sanford, Bunnell, Tavares, Ocala, Bartow, Bushnell, Kissimmee, and Titusville.  
National and world news and what it means for you. 
Engaging content that you can share easily from the app to Twitter and Facebook.

Get accessible coverage that keeps you up-to-date with WFTV Channel 9. 

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Please note: This app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

apps.title: WFLA News Channel 8 - Tampa FL
apps.description:
Experience the brand new WFLA News Channel 8 News app. The WFLA.com app is On Your Side with the latest breaking news, sports, and weather coverage for the Tampa Bay area, including Tampa, St. Petersburg and Clearwater, FL, Hillsborough, Pinellas, Polk, Pasco and Hernado counties, plus the Orlando area.

Get more news, more weather and more video. It's everything you love about WFLA News Channel 8 right at your fingertips.

FEATURES:
- Live News Channel 8 broadcasts & on-demand replays
- Current news and Storm Team 8 weather is featured right on the home screen
- Navigate easily through local news and information that's important to you
- Stay informed of breaking news with push alerts
- View local news videos embedded within stories or at full screen
- Understand how weather will affect you with local forecasts, radar, maps and video
- Alerts for severe weather and closings/delays appear on the home screen
- See the latest traffic conditions on an interactive map
- Help shape local coverage by submitting photos and news tips through Send It
- Easily share interesting articles via e-mail, SMS, Facebook(R), Twitter(TM), and more
- The latest on the Buccaneers, Rays, Lightning, Bulls and other Bay area sports
- From Gasparilla to the Florida Strawberry Festival, we're On Your Side.

Please review the app and let us know what you think.

apps.title: FOX61 WTIC Connecticut News
apps.description:
Stay up-to-date with the latest news and weather in the Connecticut area on the all-new free FOX61 app from WTIC. 

Our app features the latest breaking news that impacts you and your family, interactive weather and radar, and live video from our newscasts and local events.

LOCAL & BREAKING NEWS
• Receive real-time notifications for breaking news
• Read the latest news as it happens in your area
• Explore exclusive investigative stories
• Browse photos, news clips, and raw video

LOCAL WEATHER
• Daily and hourly forecasts for your city
• The latest forecasts from our meteorologists
• Interactive radar maps
• Sign up for government-issued severe weather alerts in your area

LIVE VIDEO
• Watch live video newscasts and breaking news from WTIC/WCCT

PERSONALIZATION
• Discover and dive into topics that matter to you
• Favorite topics to receive personalized updates

Other Features:
• Share stories & videos directly with your friends and family
• See the latest updates and behind the scenes photos from your favorite anchors and reporters
• Get information on school delays & closings as they happen
• Cast videos and livestreams directly to your TV or streaming device, so you can lean back and enjoy your favorite programming on your biggest screen.

This is the official app of WTIC/WCCT and fox61.com, the FOX affiliate serving the Connecticut area.

Got feedback? Let us know how we can make this the best app experience for you! Send us a note at appfeedback@tegna.com.

Privacy Policy: https://www.fox61.com/privacy
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.fox61.com/do-not-sell-my-information
Terms of Service: https://www.fox61.com/terms

apps.title: Greenville News
apps.description:
From critically acclaimed storytelling to powerful photography to engaging videos — the Greenville News app delivers the local news that matters most to your community.

APP FEATURES:
• Access all of our in-depth journalism, including things to do around town, sports coverage from high school to the pros, and much more.
• Enjoy a streamlined, fast-loading experience that makes it easy to view the stories, photos, and videos that matter to you.
• Get breaking news, sports scores, and weather alerts with real-time notifications tailored to your interests.
• Customize your experience by saving your favorite stories, adjusting text size, using night mode, or reading offline.
• eNewspaper: Just like our print edition but accessible on your mobile devices. And access to USA TODAY and 200+ local eNewspapers. 

MORE INFORMATION:
• Privacy Policy: https://cm.greenvilleonline.com/privacy/
• Terms of Service: https://cm.greenvilleonline.com/terms/
• Questions or Comments: feedback@usatoday.com
• Subscriptions are charged to your account at confirmation of purchase and automatically renew each month or year, unless turned off in your account settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable. See "Subscription Support" in the app's Settings for more details and customer service contact information.

apps.title: Seeking Alpha: News & Analysis
apps.description:
Seeking Alpha provides active and engaged investors with a wide range of tools and resources to make data-driven investment decisions.

Our platform offers:
Real-time financial news and market-moving analysis
Insight on our ‘Strong Buy’ ratings, plus more than 1,300 stocks Wall St. doesn’t cover
Expert insights from investors and industry professionals
Customizable alerts for stocks in your watchlist
Price quotes, charts, and portfolio tracking tools
Access to earnings reports, transcripts, and filings

With millions of monthly users, Seeking Alpha is a global community where investors share ideas, create strategies, and discuss breaking financial news. Our coverage spans stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, commodities, and cryptocurrencies, including analysis of small and mid-cap stocks often overlooked elsewhere.

Thousands of contributors publish investment theses monthly, each undergoing rigorous editorial review. This crowdsourced approach provides diverse perspectives and in-depth analysis across various sectors and investment strategies.

Seeking Alpha provides knowledgeable investors with financial analysis by offering tools previously available only to institutional investors. Our suite of plans caters to different investing styles and needs, providing advanced tracking, monitoring, charting, and analytical capabilities.

BASIC MEMBERSHIP
A Basic Seeking Alpha account provides access to a wealth of financial information from a diverse community of investors and experts - at no cost.

With our free plan, you’ll get:
- One Premium article per month - free
- Real-time stock prices
- The option to create your own portfolio
- Real-time alerts on the stocks you follow
- Wall Street Ratings for every stock
- Limited access to other content

PREMIUM (in-app subscription available)
Seeking Alpha Premium provides investors with all the tools, resources, and industry-leading ratings needed to give a portfolio the edge it needs.

With Premium, you’ll get all the features of Basic, plus:
- Unlimited access to expert investor content
- A thriving community of serious investors to discuss and debate ideas
- Seeking Alpha's Quant Ratings - our 'Strong Buy' ratings outperform the S&P 500
- Rankings of stop stocks and ETFs to help identify opportunities
- Stock and ETF screeners to help construct your portfolio
- Portfolio health check and warnings to help you become a more informed investor
- Listen to articles, access to webinars and more


ALPHA PICKS
Alpha Picks, perfect for a buy-and-hold strategy, puts the power of Quant at your fingertips and enables you to invest smarter, not harder.  Since inception, the Alpha Picks portfolio has consistently outperformed the S&P 500.  https://seekingalpha.com/alpha-picks/about

With Alpha Picks, you’ll get:
- Two new stock picks each month, delivered right to your inbox
- Hold and Sell alerts when ratings shift, along with regular performance updates
- Members-only webinars, plus access to our stock selection research
- Access to our entire Alpha Picks portfolio

INVESTING GROUPS
Guided by leading analysts on Seeking Alpha, Investing Groups offer a unique opportunity to connect with like-minded investors and explore the sectors and strategies that interest you.

Features of Investing Groups include:
- Exclusive portfolios and stock ideas
- Unparalleled analysis and investor resources
- Real-time alerts and commentary
- Live community chat with like-minded investors
- Direct access to your Investing Group leader

PRO
Seeking Alpha PRO offers enhanced features and exclusive content that will give you a competitive edge in the market.

With PRO, you’ll have access to all of the benefits of Premium, plus:
- Daily updating ranking of top 15 analysts
- Investing ideas from our top 50 analysts
- Comprehensive upgrades and downgrades
- Vetted short-selling ideas
- Exclusive ‘Buys’ and ‘Strong Buys’
- Dedicated customer relationship manager

Terms of Use:
https://seekingalpha.com/page/terms-of-use

apps.title: TMZ
apps.description:
Your #1 source for breaking entertainment news.
 
Download the free TMZ app to discover breaking stories from the heart of Hollywood. From shocking, exclusive details to hilarious pop culture moments, the TMZ app will always keep you in the know.
 
Features:
 
• EXCLUSIVE STORIES — Whether it’s legal drama, wild photos, or exciting footage, get access to accurate information you won’t find anywhere else.
 
• BREAKING ALERTS — Be first to receive breaking news notifications right to your device.
 
• NEWS WIDGET — View the latest stories right from your Home Screen and Lock Screen with the TMZ widget.
 
• CANDID FOOTAGE — Watch exclusive interviews of your favorite celebrities & entertainers, up close and personal.
 
• HOT PHOTOS — Get lost in endless, curated galleries of funny, sexy, and eye-popping pics.
 
• STREAM EPISODES — Never miss your daily dose of TMZ by streaming full episodes of “TMZ on TV” and “TMZ Live” on demand.
 
 
We may work with mobile advertising companies and other similar entities that help deliver advertisements tailored to your interests. For more information about such advertising practices, and to opt-out in mobile apps, see http://www.aboutads.info/choices/. You may also download the App Choices app at http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices

apps.title: Aaj Tak Live Hindi News India
apps.description:
Stay ahead with Aaj Tak, India’s most trusted, most-watched, and most-awarded Hindi news channel—now on your smartphone. The Aaj Tak App (हिंदी न्यूज़ ऐप) brings you Live TV, breaking news, real-time updates, and in-depth analysis across politics, world affairs, sports, business, technology, entertainment, and more.
Why Aaj Tak?
Live TV: Watch Aaj Tak Live anytime, anywhere for free.
News Reels: Watch the latest bite-sized news videos on the go!
Breaking News Alerts: Stay updated with real-time push notifications.
Exclusive Analysis: Deep dives, expert opinions, and special reports from top journalists.
AI-Powered Personalization: Get news tailored to your interests.
Aaj Tak Radio: Listen to news on the go—no video needed!
Live Cricket & Sports Coverage: Instant updates, scores & expert insights.
Video News Library: Missed an update? Watch top stories anytime.
Share Instantly: Spread the news via WhatsApp, X, Instagram, or email.
Watch Top TV Shows & Programs
Stream the best of Aaj Tak, including Halla Bol, Black & White, 10 Tak, Special Report and others.
Get News Across All Categories
India News (भारत न्यूज़): Politics, policies & governance updates.
World News (अंतरराष्ट्रीय समाचार): Stay informed on global affairs.
Sports News (खेल समाचार): Cricket, football, WWE, motorsports & beyond.
Entertainment & Bollywood News: Films, OTT, celebrity updates.
Tech & Gadgets (टेक न्यूज़): Mobiles, AI, apps & social trends.
Crime & Investigation: In-depth crime stories and analysis.
Lifestyle & Health: Fitness, wellness & trending topics.
Photo & Video Galleries
Explore stunning images of Bollywood stars, sports icons, political leaders & viral moments.
Aaj Tak Radio & Podcast
Turn on audio mode and listen to live news updates without streaming video.
Your News, Your Way
Set personalized notifications
Bookmark stories for later
Watch video news at your convenience
Upcoming Events
Stay ahead with coverage of the biggest events happening in India and around the world:
- India Today Conclave 2025 – Exclusive insights from top global and Indian leaders.
- Champions Trophy 2025 – Full coverage of cricket’s biggest event with live scores and match reports.
- WPL 2025 - Full coverage of Women's Premier League  Download Now & Stay Sabse Tez!
 Disclaimer: Aaj Tak and TV Today Network Ltd. are independent media organizations and are not affiliated with any government body or entity. We do not provide government services or represent any government organization.

apps.title: The Philadelphia Inquirer
apps.description:
Staying on top of award-winning Philadelphia news is now faster and easier than ever with The Philadelphia Inquirer’s iPhone and iPad app — the official iOS news app for The Philadelphia Inquirer and Philadelphia Daily News.

With The Philadelphia Inquirer App you can:
Discover the latest breaking news and important updates with our intuitive news feed and uncluttered reading experience.
Explore the news topics you care about, from sports teams like the Eagles and Phillies to local news and insights, with our seamless section navigation.
Remember the stories that matter to you with quick action buttons for bookmarking and sharing.
Never miss a story with Basic and Premium digital all-access subscriptions, available as an in-app purchase.

Additional Features:
Alerts and Notifications — Be the first to know with verified breaking news. Easily access breaking news articles with one tap on a notification.
Newsletters — Stay on top of the news in your inbox. Sign up for the newsletters you’d like to receive to get the very best of The Inquirer.
Frequent Updates — Stay connected with 24/7 coverage and other important news throughout the day.
Log In — Use your existing Inquirer account or register a new one.
Customized Feed — Customize your news feed to follow the topics that matter most to you. Switch between your custom feed and Latest Headlines with just a tap.
Custom Text Size — Read more comfortably with the ability to increase/decrease article font sizes.
Split Screen Support — Multitask with The Inquirer App and other apps at the same time on compatible iPads.
Today Widget — Quickly access the latest headlines by adding our custom widget to your homescreen or Today screen.
Dark Mode — Activate from the Settings tab and the app will switch to dark mode when activated on your device for easier nighttime reading.

We’d love to hear your feedback! Reach out to our support team under Settings > Submit Feedback.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Fixed an issue where some readers were unable to see the latest news tab.

apps.title: NBC 5 Dallas-Fort Worth News
apps.description:
The NBC 5 Dallas-Fort Worth news and weather app connects you with your local news, local weather and a free, 24/7 streaming news channel. Free to download and to use, the app delivers North Texas breaking news alerts and weather alerts for your location that can be customized and easily managed in the app settings. 

The app gives you access to DFW local news from the award-winning NBC 5 DFW news team, covering the issues and concerns most important to residents in North Texas. The NBC 5 Weather Experts deliver accurate local forecasts that keep app users safe and informed while on the go. Access a powerful weather radar and customize the weather screen based on your preferences. 

Dallas-Fort Worth Weather
+ Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange 
+ Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts 
+ The only live S-Band weather radar in North Texas
+Exclusive weather coverage from Texas Thunder Truck and Texas StormRanger’s X Band radar
+ 10-day forecasts from the NBC 5 Weather Experts for your region of North Texas
+ Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable graph 
+ Detailed forecast data that includes UV index and air quality in North Texas
+ Weather alerts for every location you save in the app
+ Hurricane warnings and storm tracker 
+ Complete weather closings for DFW schools
+ Weather news videos from your local meteorologists

DFW News Alerts
+ Alerts for DFW local news, national headlines and world news that can be personalized and managed in the app settings
Top news of the day, covering breaking news, politics, weather and urgent product recalls 
+ Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order
+ Alerts center that shows you the most urgent DFW stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications
+Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in DFW local news and pop culture

NBC DFW News 24/7 Streaming Channel
+  Free 24/7 streaming channel for nonstop local North Texas news, weather and special coverage around the clock, wherever you are
+ Live NBC 5 DFW newscasts 
+ Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in North Texas
+ Dedicated video page with the latest video feed   

Create an NBC DFW Account
 + Save articles and videos to view later
 + Sync preferences and newsletter subscriptions across NBC platforms

NBC 5 DFW I-Team Investigations & More
+ Award-winning NBC 5 investigative stories that get results
+ NBC 5 Responds reports on recovering your money
+ Submission platform for your news and weather photos
+ Sports news from NBC Sports Regional Sports Networks
+ Business news and financial insights from CNBC
+ Entertainment news from E! Online
+ Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY Show

The NBC 5 Dallas-Fort Worth news and weather app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC_5_Dallas-Fort_Worth/  
CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_5_Dallas_Fort_Worth

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
- You can now create a free account in the app. By signing in with your NBCUniversal Profile, you’ll be able to save articles and videos to view later, and manage your newsletter subscriptions across NBCUniversal platforms.
- This update also includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Please rate our app in the App Store and send your feedback to KXASdigitalfeedback@nbcuni.com.

apps.title: The San Francisco Chronicle
apps.description:
Know more about San Francisco and the Bay Area with the San Francisco Chronicle app. Stay informed with trusted journalism wherever you are.  

- Get San Francisco news alerts and notifications, customized by preferred topics 
- Catch college sports and Giants, 49ers and Warriors coverage  
- Explore food coverage: reviews, local spots, Top 100 Bay Area Restaurants
- Stay on top of Bay Area news, California politics, business, food and development stories
- Page through the e-Edition, a digital replica of the newspaper
- Stay sharp with Puzzmo’s reimagined favorites and brand-new puzzles
- Listen to Chronicle stories with Everlit, a text-to-audio tool 
- Check out exclusive guides and compelling columns and commentary

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:
Subscribe for unlimited digital access to the app, SFChronicle.com, e-Edition and newsletters. Get 1 month free, then $14.99 per month. Cancel anytime. 

Current digital and print subscribers have unlimited access to the app. 

- Digital subscribers: Sign in to the app to access your benefit. 
- Print subscribers: If you haven’t activated your digital access yet, look for “Activate Access” at the bottom of the app welcome screen. 

PAYMENT: Payment will be charged to your iTunes account with the confirmation of your purchase and will automatically renew each month unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of your monthly period.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

PRIVACY POLICY: https://www.SFChronicle.com/privacy_policy/
TERMS OF SERVICE: https://www.SFChronicle.com/terms_of_use/

FEEDBACK: We want to hear from you! Let us know if you have questions or suggestions: appsupport@sfchronicle.com.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: WGAL News 8
apps.description:
Take the WGAL News 8 app with you everywhere you go and be the first to know of breaking news happening in Lancaster and the surrounding area. Always stay up to date with the latest local news, national, sports, traffic, political, entertainment stories and much more. Download the WGAL News 8 app for free today.

Our Local News, Weather and Sports App Features Include:
- Lancaster breaking news alerts with push notifications
- Live streaming breaking news updates from our WGAL News 8 reporters when it happens, where it happens
- Local news submission area for breaking news, news tips and the ability to email your news photos and videos right to our newsroom to be featured on air
- Up to date, current local weather conditions, hourly Lancaster weather updates, and 7 day forecasts
- An interactive radar that lets you zoom in and out to street level and watch storms as they approach. Move the map around to see major weather activity
- Share stories via email or your social media pages
- Lancaster weather alerts and updates, News 8 Storm Team videocasts and more

Although Hearst Television believes the majority of its news content is appropriate for a variety of ages, it is intended for individuals 18 and older.

apps.title: WWLP 22News – Springfield MA
apps.description:
News has never been more local than in the palm of your hand. The WWLP-22News mobile app brings you all the top stories from our daily broadcasts, as well as stories developing in real time.

WWLP-22News has the latest breaking news, I-Team investigations and weather for Hampden, Hampshire, Franklin and Berkshire Counties, as well as reports from our exclusive bureau in the Massachusetts State House.

apps.title: Hindi News by Dainik Bhaskar
apps.description:
India’s largest Newspaper Group “Dainik Bhaskar” brings to you a slick, fast & smooth News app for the latest news in Hindi, Hindi e-newspaper & Video News about your town. 

Dainik Bhaskar is India’s leading newsgroup in Hindi. We have extensive coverage of 2000+ cities across the country. We are the leading news source for coverage for all cities of Madhya Pradesh (MP), Rajasthan, Bihar, Gujarat, Chhattisgarh, Jharkhand, Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh and Himachal. 

List of cities that we cover include Jaipur, Gwalior, Jodhpur, Indore, Bhopal, Alwar, Kota, Sikar, Bharatpur, Udaipur, Raipur, Surat, Ajmer, Pali, New Delhi, NCR, Patna, Nagaur, Sri Ganganagar, Jhunjhunu, Bikaner, Sagar, Ujjain, Bilaspur, Dausa, Sawai Madhopur, Bhilwara, Ratlam, Karauli, Shivpuri, Hisar, Tonk, Panipat, Bhind, Morena, Barmer, Churu, Chandigarh, Ranchi, Khandwa, Bhilai, Dholpur, Hoshangabad, Chittorgarh, Bundi, Dhar, Rohtak, Jhalore, Rewari. 

Find all the news that matters from these categories - Local (City & Town), National, Global, Business, Sports, Health, Lifestyle, Tech & Auto. Get all the latest video updates.

Feature List:

City News: Dainik Bhaskar brings to you news from over 2000+ towns & cities to your phone. You will never miss out on what is happening around you or in your hometown. You will get updates on all the local current events like politics, weather, traffic, crimes, accidents, etc.

Video News: Get all the updates about Local (City & Town), National, Global, Business, Sports, Health, Lifestyle, Tech & Auto in your preferred video formats. Watch all the latest news through short videos. You can share news videos with friends & family

Epaper: Read the latest Hindi News epaper from your city. Get access to 200+ epapers editions all from till a year back for free. Download the epaper & read it anytime you want. 

Politics: Stay updated with all the latest news about politics from across the country. Get access to everything said by all the leading politicians from Narendra Modi to Rahul Gandhi. Be informed about all the policies & promises of leading political parties like the Bharatiya Janta Party (BJP), Indian National Congress (INC), TMC, BSP, SP, etc. 

Business: Get all the updates from the Business world with coverage of Share Market, SENSEX, BSE, NSE, NIFTY, Trading News, IPO, Gold Rate, Today’s Dollar Rate, Today’s Rupee Rate, Startups, SMEs, etc. We have merged our Business app “Money Bhaskar” within this app & now we have the most detailed coverage of the Business industry 

Sports: We bring to you all the latest sports updates, live cricket scores. Stay up to date with what your favorite athletes like Virat Kohli, M.S Dhoni are up to.

Bollywood: Stay updated with all the latest Bollywood gossips, rumors & reviews. Always remain on top of all the trends, see what your favorite stars like Salman, Shahrukh, Priyanka, Deepika & Akshay are doing.  

Rashifal: Get daily astrology & horoscope updates about Lovelife, career, health, wealth & more from well-known experts like Bejan Daruwalla, get Tarot card updates from Sheela M. Bajaj & know all about your numerology from Dr. Kumar Ganesh.  

Notification: Get the latest news notifications & breaking news alerts.

If you subscribe to Dainik Bhaskar via iTunes, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscription will be renewed within 24-hours before the end of each period at the rate of your selected plan. Turn off auto-renewal anytime through iTunes.
Privacy policy: https://epaper.bhaskar.com/privacy-policy
Terms of use:  https://www.bhaskar.com/__widgets__/terms-and-conditions

No Fake News: Stay away from all the rumors circulating on Whatsapp. We give you the truth behind all the fake news 

Visit our site: dainikbhaskar.com
Other websites: 
divyabhaskar.co.in
divyamarathi.bhaskar.com

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve also made performance improvements and bug fixes to keep things running smoothly. This update is recommended for all users.
